ObservableCollection<Column> Columns { get { return this.columns; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Boolean AllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive {Di2015NewLine    get { return this.allColumnsAreActiveOrInactive; }Di2015NewLine    set {Di2015NewLine      if (value == this.allColumnsAreActiveOrInactive)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine (handler != null)Di2015NewLine      handler(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(propertyName));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void CollectionChanged(Object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    if (e.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset) {Di2015NewLine      RecomputeAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive();Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (e.OldItems != null) {Di2015NewLine      foreach (var item in e.OldItems.Cast<Column>())Di2015NewLine        item.PropertyChanged -= ColumnPropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine      RecomputeAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive();Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (e.NewItems != null) {Di2015NewLine      foreach (var column in e.NewItems.Cast<Column>()) {Di2015NewLine        column.PropertyChanged += ColumnPropertyChanged;Di2015NewLine        this.allColumnsAreActive = this.allColumnsAreActive && column.IsActive;Di2015NewLine        this.allColumnsAreInactive = this.allColumnsAreInactive && !column.IsActive;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      UpdateAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void ColumnPropertyChanged(Object sender, PropertyChangedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    if (e.PropertyName == "IsActive") {Di2015NewLine      var column = sender as Column;Di2015NewLine      RecomputeAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void RecomputeAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive() {Di2015NewLine    this.allColumnsAreActive = this.columns.All(c => c.IsActive);Di2015NewLine    this.allColumnsAreInactive = this.columns.All(c => !c.IsActive);Di2015NewLine    UpdateAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  void UpdateAllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive() {Di2015NewLine    AllColumnsAreActiveOrInactive = this.columns.Any()Di2015NewLine      && (this.allColumnsAreActive || this.allColumnsAreInactive);Di2015NewLine 10601423Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Compare(int i1, int i2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int result = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(i1 != 0 && i2 != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var d1 = i1 % 10;Di2015NewLine        var d2 = i2 % 10;Di2015NewLine        i1 /= 10;Di2015NewLine        i2 /= 10;Di2015NewLine        if(d1 == d2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if(i1 != 0 || i2 != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Integers must be of same length.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10602166Di2015UniqueSeparator/* http://csrc.nist.gov/publications/fips/fips197/fips-197.pdf page 35 and 36 */Di2015NewLinevar passwordBytes = new byte[] { 0x00, 0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04, 0x05, 0x06, 0x07, Di2015NewLine   0x08, 0x09, 0x0a, 0x0b, 0x0c, 0x0d, 0x0e, 0x0f };Di2015NewLinevar unencryptedBytes = new byte[] { 0x00, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33, 0x44, 0x55, 0x66,Di2015NewLine   0x77, 0x88, 0x99, 0xaa, 0xbb, 0xcc, 0xdd, 0xee, 0xff };Di2015NewLinevar initvectorBytes = new byte[] { 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,Di2015NewLine   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var aes = new AesManaged())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   aes.BlockSize = 128; /* size in bits */Di2015NewLine   aes.KeySize = 128; /* size in bits */Di2015NewLine   aes.Key = passwordBytes;Di2015NewLine   aes.IV = initvectorBytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      using (var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(Di2015NewLine         memoryStream, aes.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         cryptoStream.Write(unencryptedBytes, 0, unencryptedBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine         cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         var stream = memoryStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine         /* now you get: Di2015NewLine            69-c4-e0-d8-6a-7b-04-30-d8-cd-b7-80-70-b4-c5-5a = 128 bitDi2015NewLine            according to http://testprotect.com/appendix/AEScalc and fips-197.pdfDi2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine         var output = BitConverter.ToString(stream);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10606378Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression
10606378Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateGreaterThanExpression<T>(Expression<Func<T, decimal>> fieldExtractor, decimal value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var xPar = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine    var x = new ParameterRebinder(xPar);Di2015NewLine    var getter = (MemberExpression)x.Visit(fieldExtractor.Body);Di2015NewLine    var resultBody = Expression.GreaterThan(getter, Expression.Constant(value, typeof(decimal)));Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(resultBody, xPar);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate sealed class ParameterRebinder : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression _parameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParameterRebinder(ParameterExpression parameter)Di2015NewLine    { this._parameter = parameter; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression p)Di2015NewLine    { return base.VisitParameter(this._parameter); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10606378Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreateLessThanExpression
10606378Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreateBetweenExpression
10606378Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Expression<Func<T, bool>> CreateFilterFromString<T>(Expression<Func<T, decimal>> fieldExtractor, string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var greaterOrLessRegex = new Regex(@"^\\s*(?<sign>\\>|\\<)\\s*(?<number>\\d+(\\.\\d+){0,1})\\s*$");Di2015NewLine    var match = greaterOrLessRegex.Match(text);Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var number = decimal.Parse(match.Result("${number}"));Di2015NewLine        var sign = match.Result("${sign}");Di2015NewLine        switch (sign)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ">":Di2015NewLine                return CreateGreaterThanExpression(fieldExtractor, number);Di2015NewLine            case "<":Di2015NewLine                return CreateLessThanExpression(fieldExtractor, number);Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Bad Sign!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var betweenRegex = new Regex(@"^\\s*(?<number1>\\d+(\\.\\d+){0,1})\\s*-\\s*(?<number2>\\d+(\\.\\d+){0,1})\\s*$");Di2015NewLine    match = betweenRegex.Match(text);Di2015NewLine    if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var number1 = decimal.Parse(match.Result("${number1}"));Di2015NewLine        var number2 = decimal.Parse(match.Result("${number2}"));Di2015NewLine        return CreateBetweenExpression(fieldExtractor, number1, number2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Bad filter Format!");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10607367Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object FormatPhoneNumber(string phoneNumber)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // return nothing if the string is nullDi2015NewLine   if(String.IsNullOrEmpty(phoneNumber))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       return "";    Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // invalid phone number submittedDi2015NewLine   if(phoneNumber.Length != 10)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       throw new System.ArgumentException("Phone Number must contain 10 digits", "phoneNumber");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // probably want one more check to ensure the string contains numbers and not characters, but then again, hopefully that's handled on input validation.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // if the int is valid, return the formatted textDi2015NewLine   return string.Format("({0}) {1}-{2}",Di2015NewLine          phoneNumber.Substring(0, 3),Di2015NewLine          phoneNumber.Substring(3, 3),Di2015NewLine          phoneNumber.Substring(6));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10608638Di2015UniqueSeparator// little test console appDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    var list = new SearchStringList(true);Di2015NewLine    list.Add("Now is the time");Di2015NewLine    list.Add("for all good men");Di2015NewLine    list.Add("Time now for something");Di2015NewLine    list.Add("something completely different");Di2015NewLine    while (true) {Di2015NewLine        string keyword = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        if (keyword.Length == 0) break;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pos in list.FindAll(keyword)) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(pos.ToString() + " =>" + list[pos.ListIndex]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Di2015NewLine// file for the class that implements a simple suffix arrayDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1 {Di2015NewLine    public class SearchStringList {Di2015NewLine        private List<string> strings = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        private List<StringPosition> positions = new List<StringPosition>();Di2015NewLine        private bool dirty = false;Di2015NewLine        private readonly bool ignoreCase = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public SearchStringList(bool ignoreCase) {Di2015NewLine            this.ignoreCase = ignoreCase;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Add(string s) {Di2015NewLine            if (s.Length > 255) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("string too big.");Di2015NewLine            this.strings.Add(s);Di2015NewLine            this.dirty = true;Di2015NewLine            for (byte i = 0; i < s.Length; i++) this.positions.Add(new StringPosition(strings.Count-1, i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string this[int index] { get { return this.strings[index]; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void EnsureSorted() {Di2015NewLine            if (dirty) {Di2015NewLine                this.positions.Sort(Compare);Di2015NewLine                this.dirty = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<StringPosition> FindAll(string keyword) {Di2015NewLine            var idx = IndexOf(keyword);Di2015NewLine            while ((idx >= 0) && (idx < this.positions.Count)Di2015NewLine                && (Compare(keyword, this.positions[idx]) == 0)) {Di2015NewLine                yield return this.positions[idx];Di2015NewLine                idx++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int IndexOf(string keyword) {Di2015NewLine            EnsureSorted();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // binary searchDi2015NewLine            // When the keyword appears multiple times, this shouldDi2015NewLine            // point to the first match in positions. The followingDi2015NewLine            // positions could be examined for additional matchesDi2015NewLine            int minP = 0;Di2015NewLine            int maxP = this.positions.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine            while (maxP > minP) {Di2015NewLine                int midP = minP + ((maxP - minP) / 2);Di2015NewLine                if (Compare(keyword, this.positions[midP]) > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    minP = midP + 1;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    maxP = midP;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if ((maxP == minP) && (Compare(keyword, this.positions[minP]) == 0)) {Di2015NewLine                return minP;Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                return -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int Compare(StringPosition pos1, StringPosition pos2) {Di2015NewLine            int len = Math.Max(this.strings[pos1.ListIndex].Length - pos1.StringIndex, this.strings[pos2.ListIndex].Length - pos2.StringIndex);Di2015NewLine            return String.Compare(strings[pos1.ListIndex], pos1.StringIndex, this.strings[pos2.ListIndex], pos2.StringIndex, len, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int Compare(string keyword, StringPosition pos2) {Di2015NewLine            return String.Compare(keyword, 0, this.strings[pos2.ListIndex], pos2.StringIndex, keyword.Length, this.ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Packs index of string, and position within string into a single int. This isDi2015NewLine        // set up for strings no greater than 255 bytes. If longer strings are desired,Di2015NewLine        // the code for the constructor, and extracting  ListIndex and StringIndex wouldDi2015NewLine        // need to be modified accordingly, taking bits from ListIndex and using themDi2015NewLine        // for StringIndex.Di2015NewLine        public struct StringPosition {Di2015NewLine            public static StringPosition NotFound = new StringPosition(-1, 0);Di2015NewLine            private readonly int position;Di2015NewLine            public StringPosition(int listIndex, byte stringIndex) {Di2015NewLine                this.position = (listIndex < 0) ? -1 : this.position = (listIndex << 8) | stringIndex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public int ListIndex { get { return (this.position >= 0) ? (this.position >> 8) : -1; } }Di2015NewLine            public byte StringIndex { get { return (byte) (this.position & 0xFF); } }Di2015NewLine            public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine                return ListIndex.ToString() + ":" + StringIndex;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10609707Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ReflectionConsole {Di2015NewLine    class Program {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object test = TryToReflectBuilder("ReflectionConsole.Test");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static object TryToReflectBuilder(string type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //getting the assembly : not same as your way, but... that wasn't a problem for youDi2015NewLine            var assembly = Assembly.GetAssembly(typeof(Test));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //getting the entityType by name.Di2015NewLine            var entityType = assembly.GetType(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //The interesting (I hope) part is starting (yeah)Di2015NewLine            //get the Builder<T> typeDi2015NewLine            var builderClassType = typeof(Builder<>);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create generic argument for Builder<T> will take the type of our entity (always an array)Di2015NewLine            Type[] args = {entityType};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //pass generic arguments to Builder<T>. Which becomes Builder<entityType>Di2015NewLine            var genericBuilderType = builderClassType.MakeGenericType(args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create a new instance of Builder<entityType>Di2015NewLine            var builder = Activator.CreateInstance(genericBuilderType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //retrieve the "CreateNew" method, which belongs to Builder<T> classDi2015NewLine            var createNewMethodInfo = builder.GetType().GetMethod("CreateNew");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //invoke "CreateNew" from our builder instance which gives us an ObjectBuilder<T>, so now an ObjectBuilder<entityType> (well as an ISingleObjectBuilder<entityType>, but... who minds ;))Di2015NewLine            var objectBuilder = createNewMethodInfo.Invoke(builder, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //retrieve the "Build" method, which belongs to ObjectBuilder<T> classDi2015NewLine            var buildMethodInfo = objectBuilder.GetType().GetMethod("Build");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //finally, invoke "Build" from our ObjectBuilder<entityType> instance, which will give us... our entity !Di2015NewLine            var result = buildMethodInfo.Invoke(objectBuilder, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //it would be sad to return nothing after all these efforts, no ??Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public  class Builder<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static ISingleObjectBuilder<T> CreateNew()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(string.Format("{0} creating new",typeof(T)));Di2015NewLine            return new ObjectBuilder<T>();Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface ISingleObjectBuilder<T> : IBuildable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public interface IObjectBuilder<T> : ISingleObjectBuilder<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public interface IBuildable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T Build();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ObjectBuilder<T> : ISingleObjectBuilder<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public T Build()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(string.Format("{0} building myself", typeof(T)));Di2015NewLine            return Activator.CreateInstance<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10611149Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BitwiseDateStampDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BitwiseDateStamp(DateTime dt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._value = dt.Year << 20;Di2015NewLine        this._value |= dt.Month << 16;Di2015NewLine        this._value |= dt.Day << 11;Di2015NewLine        this._value |= dt.Hour << 6;Di2015NewLine        this._value |= dt.Minute;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BitwiseDateStamp() : this(DateTime.Now)Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTime ToDateTime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int year = this._value >> 20;Di2015NewLine        int month = (this._value & 0x000f0000) >> 16;Di2015NewLine        int day = (this._value & 0x0000f800) >> 11;Di2015NewLine        int hour = (this._value & 0x000007c0) >> 6;Di2015NewLine        int minute = this._value & 0x0000003f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new DateTime(year, month, day, hour, minute, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this._value.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10613631Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<MyEntity, bool>> e1 = i => i.FName.Contains("john");Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<MyEntity, bool>> e2 = i => i.LName.Contains("smith");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // rewrite e1, using the parameter from e2; "&&"Di2015NewLine        var lambda1 = Expression.Lambda<Func<MyEntity, bool>>(Expression.AndAlso(Di2015NewLine            new SwapVisitor(e1.Parameters[0], e2.Parameters[0]).Visit(e1.Body),Di2015NewLine            e2.Body), e2.Parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // rewrite e1, using the parameter from e2; "||"Di2015NewLine        var lambda2 = Expression.Lambda<Func<MyEntity, bool>>(Expression.OrElse(Di2015NewLine            new SwapVisitor(e1.Parameters[0], e2.Parameters[0]).Visit(e1.Body),Di2015NewLine            e2.Body), e2.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10614507Di2015UniqueSeparatorsealed class DataIO : IDataIODi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void SetChannel(IDataIO concreteChannel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_concreteChannel != null)Di2015NewLine            _concreteChannel.DataReceived -= OnDataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _concreteChannel = concreteChannel;Di2015NewLine        _concreteChannel.DataReceived += OnDataReceived;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Write(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _concreteChannel.Write(data);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte[] Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _concreteChannel.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler DataReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IDataIO _concreteChannel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnDataReceived(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EventHandler dataReceived = DataReceived;Di2015NewLine        if (dataReceived != null)Di2015NewLine            dataReceived(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10616963Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    namespace csharp.util.charsetDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public class SysUtilDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Convert a string from one charset to another charsetDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="strText">source string</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="strSrcEncoding">original encoding name</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="strDestEncoding">dest encoding name</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine            public static String StringEncodingConvert(String strText, String strSrcEncoding, String strDestEncoding)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Text.Encoding srcEnc = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding(strSrcEncoding);Di2015NewLine                System.Text.Encoding destEnc = System.Text.Encoding.GetEncoding(strDestEncoding);Di2015NewLine                byte[] bData=srcEnc.GetBytes(strText);Di2015NewLine                byte[] bResult = System.Text.Encoding.Convert(srcEnc, destEnc, bData);Di2015NewLine                return destEnc.GetString(bResult);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10617106Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RequestLogModule : IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private HttpApplication _application;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Init(HttpApplication context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _application = context;Di2015NewLine        _application.BeginRequest += ContextBeginRequest;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ContextBeginRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = _application.Request;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var bytes = new byte[request.InputStream.Length];Di2015NewLine        request.InputStream.Read(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        request.InputStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        string content = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Logger.LogRequest(Di2015NewLine            request.UrlReferrer == null ? 10618361Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct AgeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Int32 _years;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Int32 _months;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Int32 _days;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Int32 _totalDays;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of <see cref="Age"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="start">The date and time when the age started.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="end">The date and time when the age ended.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>This </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public Age(DateTime start, DateTime end)Di2015NewLine        : this(start, end, CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Calendar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of <see cref="Age"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="start">The date and time when the age started.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="end">The date and time when the age ended.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="calendar">Calendar used to calculate age.</param>Di2015NewLine    public Age(DateTime start, DateTime end, Calendar calendar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (start > end) throw new ArgumentException("The starting date cannot be later than the end date.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var startDate = start.Date;Di2015NewLine        var endDate = end.Date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _years = _months = _days = 0;Di2015NewLine        _days += calendar.GetDayOfMonth(endDate) - calendar.GetDayOfMonth(startDate);Di2015NewLine        if (_days < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _days += calendar.GetDaysInMonth(calendar.GetYear(startDate), calendar.GetMonth(startDate));Di2015NewLine            _months--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _months += calendar.GetMonth(endDate) - calendar.GetMonth(startDate);Di2015NewLine        if (_months < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _months += calendar.GetMonthsInYear(calendar.GetYear(startDate));Di2015NewLine            _years--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _years += calendar.GetYear(endDate) - calendar.GetYear(startDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ts = endDate.Subtract(startDate);Di2015NewLine        _totalDays = (Int32)ts.TotalDays;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the number of whole years something has aged.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 YearsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _years; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the number of whole months something has aged past the value of <see cref="Years"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 MonthsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _months; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the age as an expression of whole months.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 TotalMonthsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _years * 12 + _months; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the number of whole weeks something has aged past the value of <see cref="Years"/> and <see cref="Months"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 DaysDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _days; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the total number of days that have elapsed since the start and end dates.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 TotalDaysDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _totalDays; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the number of whole weeks something has aged past the value of <see cref="Years"/> and <see cref="Months"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 WeeksDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Int32) Math.Floor((Decimal) _days/7); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the age as an expression of whole weeks.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Int32 TotalWeeksDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Int32) Math.Floor((Decimal) _totalDays/7); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10628288Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override RouteData GetRouteData(HttpContextBase httpContext)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var host = httpContext.Request.Headers["HOST"];Di2015NewLine                var url = httpContext.Request.RawUrl;Di2015NewLine                Regex regex = new Regex("/");Di2015NewLine                string[] substrings = regex.Split(url);Di2015NewLine                if (substrings.Length >= 3)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var index = host.IndexOf(".");Di2015NewLine                if (index < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var subDomain = host.Substring(0, index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (subDomain != "www" && subDomain != "m")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var routeData = new RouteData(this, new MvcRouteHandler());Di2015NewLine                        routeData.Values.Add("controller", "Business"); //Goes to the User1Controller classDi2015NewLine                        routeData.Values.Add("action", "Display"); //Goes to the Index action on the User1ControllerDi2015NewLine                        routeData.Values.Add("id", subDomain);Di2015NewLine                    return routeData;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (subDomain == "m")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var routeData = new RouteData(this, new MvcRouteHandler());Di2015NewLine                    routeData.Values.Add("controller", "Mobile"); //Goes to the User2Controller classDi2015NewLine                    routeData.Values.Add("action", "Index"); //Goes to the Index action on the User2ControllerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return routeData;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

10628316Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static class KinectExtensionsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static WriteableBitmap CreateLivePlayerRenderer(this KinectSensor sensor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sensor.DepthStream.FrameWidth == 0)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Either open the depth stream before calling this method or use the overload which takes in the resolution that the depth stream will later be opened with.");Di2015NewLine            return CreateLivePlayerRenderer(sensor, sensor.DepthStream.FrameWidth, sensor.DepthStream.FrameHeight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static WriteableBitmap CreateLivePlayerRenderer(this KinectSensor sensor, int depthWidth, int depthHeight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AllFramesReadyEventArgs d = new AllFramesReadyEventArgs();Di2015NewLine            using (DepthImageFrame depthImage = d.OpenDepthImageFrame())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WriteableBitmap target = new WriteableBitmap(depthWidth, depthHeight, 96, 96, PixelFormats.Bgra32, null);Di2015NewLine                var depthRect = new System.Windows.Int32Rect(0, 0, depthWidth, depthHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sensor.DepthFrameReady += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Assert(depthImage.Height == depthHeight && depthImage.Width == depthWidth);Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                sensor.ColorFrameReady += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // don't do anything if we don't yet have a depth imageDi2015NewLine                    DepthImageFrame colorImage = depthImage;Di2015NewLine                    if (colorImage.BytesPerPixel == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] color = new byte[sensor.ColorStream.FramePixelDataLength];Di2015NewLine                    e.OpenColorImageFrame().CopyPixelDataTo(color);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] output = new byte[depthWidth * depthHeight * 4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // loop over each pixel in the depth imageDi2015NewLine                    int outputIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine                    for (int depthY = 0, depthIndex = 0; depthY < depthHeight; depthY++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int depthX = 0; depthX < depthWidth; depthX++, depthIndex += 2)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            short[] bits = new short[colorImage.BytesPerPixel];Di2015NewLine                            depthImage.CopyPixelDataTo(bits);Di2015NewLine                            // combine the 2 bytes of depth data representing this pixelDi2015NewLine                            short depthValue = (short)(bits[depthIndex] | (bits[depthIndex + 1] << 8));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // extract the id of a tracked player from the first bit of depth data for this pixelDi2015NewLine                            int player = bits[depthIndex] & 7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // find a pixel in the color image which matches this coordinate from the depth imageDi2015NewLine                            int colorX, colorY;Di2015NewLine                            ColorImagePoint colorPoint = depthImage.MapToColorImagePoint(depthImage.Width, depthImage.Height, sensor.ColorStream.Format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // ensure that the calculated color location is within the bounds of the imageDi2015NewLine                            colorX = colorPoint.X;Di2015NewLine                            colorY = colorPoint.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            output[outputIndex++] = color[(4 * (colorX + (colorY * e.OpenColorImageFrame().Width))) + 0];Di2015NewLine                            output[outputIndex++] = color[(4 * (colorX + (colorY * e.OpenColorImageFrame().Width))) + 1];Di2015NewLine                            output[outputIndex++] = color[(4 * (colorX + (colorY * e.OpenColorImageFrame().Width))) + 2];Di2015NewLine                            output[outputIndex++] = player > 0 ? (byte)255 : (byte)0;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    target.WritePixels(depthRect, output, depthWidth * PixelFormats.Bgra32.BitsPerPixel / 8, 0);Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                return target;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10629486Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupAdjacent<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> adjacent)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var g = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var x in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (g.Count != 0 && !adjacent(g.Last(), x))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return g;Di2015NewLine            g = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        g.Add(x);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield return g;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10631082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TimeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsBetween(this DateTime time, DateTime startTime, DateTime endTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (time.TimeOfDay == startTime.TimeOfDay) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (time.TimeOfDay == endTime.TimeOfDay) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (startTime.TimeOfDay <= endTime.TimeOfDay)Di2015NewLine            return (time.TimeOfDay >= startTime.TimeOfDay && time.TimeOfDay <= endTime.TimeOfDay);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return !(time.TimeOfDay >= endTime.TimeOfDay && time.TimeOfDay <= startTime.TimeOfDay);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10638975Di2015UniqueSeparatorMicrosoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser
10638975Di2015UniqueSeparator    Using Reader As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser(CSVPath)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Reader.TextFieldType = Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FieldType.DelimitedDi2015NewLine        Reader.Delimiters = New String() {","}Di2015NewLine        Reader.TrimWhiteSpace = TrueDi2015NewLine        Reader.HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes = TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        While Not Reader.EndOfDataDi2015NewLine            TryDi2015NewLine                Dim st2 As New List(Of String)Di2015NewLine                st2.addrange(Reader.ReadFields())Di2015NewLine                If iCount > 0 Then ' ignore first row = field namesDi2015NewLine                    Dim p As New clsPersonDi2015NewLine                    p.CSVLine = st2Di2015NewLine                    While p.CSVLine.Count < 15Di2015NewLine                        p.CSVLine.Add("")Di2015NewLine                    End WhileDi2015NewLine                    p.FirstName = st2(1).TrimDi2015NewLine                    If st2.Count > 2 ThenDi2015NewLine                        p.MiddleName = st2(2).TrimDi2015NewLine                    ElseDi2015NewLine                        p.MiddleName = ""Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    p.LastNameSuffix = st2(0).TrimDi2015NewLine                    If st2.Count >= 6 ThenDi2015NewLine                        p.TestCase = st2(5).TrimDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    If st2(3) > "" ThenDi2015NewLine                        p.CertsFromCase.Add(st2(3))Di2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                    cases.Add(p)Di2015NewLine                ElseDi2015NewLine                    stFirstRow = CatLine(st2.ToArray)Di2015NewLine                    Dim st3(6) As StringDi2015NewLine                    For kk As Integer = 0 To Math.Min(st2.Count - 1, 5)Di2015NewLine                        st3(kk) = st2(kk)Di2015NewLine                    NextDi2015NewLine                    If 0 = InStr(st3(0), "Last Name", CompareMethod.Text) Or _Di2015NewLine                     0 = InStr(st3(1), "First Name", CompareMethod.Text) Or _Di2015NewLine                     0 = InStr(st3(2), "Middle Name", CompareMethod.Text) Or _Di2015NewLine                     0 = InStr(st3(3), "Policy", CompareMethod.Text) Or _Di2015NewLine                     0 = InStr(st3(5), "Test Case", CompareMethod.Text) ThenDi2015NewLine                        stFirstRow = "Last Name,First Name,Middle Name,Policy,,Test Case #" & vbCrLf & stFirstRowDi2015NewLine                    End IfDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            Catch ex As Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.MalformedLineExceptionDi2015NewLine                MsgBox("Line " & ex.Message & " is not valid and will be skipped.")Di2015NewLine            End TryDi2015NewLine            iCount += 1Di2015NewLine        End WhileDi2015NewLine    End UsingDi2015NewLine

10646636Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void TraverseSource()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // create the BackgroundWorkerDi2015NewLine    var worker = new BackgroundWorkerDi2015NewLine                       {Di2015NewLine                          WorkerReportsProgress = trueDi2015NewLine                       };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // assign a delegate to the DoWork event, which is raised when `RunWorkerAsync` is called. this is where your actual work should be doneDi2015NewLine    worker.DoWork += (sender, args) => {Di2015NewLine       string[] allFiles1 = Directory.GetFiles(sourcePath, "*.xml", SearchOption.AllDirectories);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var allFiles = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var i = 0; i < allFiles1.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!item.Substring(item.Length - 6).Equals("MD.xml"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                allFiles.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                // notifies the worker that progress has changedDi2015NewLine                worker.ReportProgress(i/allFiles.Length*100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // assign a delegate that is raised when `ReportProgress` is called. this delegate is invoked on the original thread, so you can safely update a WinForms controlDi2015NewLine    worker.ProgressChanged += (sender, args) => {Di2015NewLine       progressBar1.Value = args.ProgressPercentage;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // OK, now actually start doing workDi2015NewLine    worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10649892Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint? prevPosition = null;Di2015NewLineToolTip tooltip = new ToolTip();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid chart1_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var pos = e.Location;Di2015NewLine    if (prevPosition.HasValue && pos == prevPosition.Value)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    tooltip.RemoveAll();Di2015NewLine    prevPosition = pos;Di2015NewLine    var results = chart1.HitTest(pos.X, pos.Y, false,Di2015NewLine                                    ChartElementType.DataPoint);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var result in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (result.ChartElementType == ChartElementType.DataPoint)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var prop = result.Object as DataPoint;Di2015NewLine            if (prop != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var pointXPixel = result.ChartArea.AxisX.ValueToPixelPosition(prop.XValue);Di2015NewLine                var pointYPixel = result.ChartArea.AxisY.ValueToPixelPosition(prop.YValues[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // check if the cursor is really close to the point (2 pixels around the point)Di2015NewLine                if (Math.Abs(pos.X - pointXPixel) < 2 &&Di2015NewLine                    Math.Abs(pos.Y - pointYPixel) < 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    tooltip.Show("X=" + prop.XValue + ", Y=" + prop.YValues[0], this.chart1,Di2015NewLine                                    pos.X, pos.Y - 15);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

rights)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr lsaHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LSA_UNICODE_STRING[] system = null;Di2015NewLine        LSA_OBJECT_ATTRIBUTES lsaAttr;Di2015NewLine IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        lsaAttr.SecurityQualityOfService = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        lsaAttr.Length = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(LSA_OBJECT_ATTRIBUTES));Di2015NewLine        lsaHandle = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        uint ret = LsaOpenPolicy(system, ref lsaAttr, (int)Access.POLICY_ALL_ACCESS, out lsaHandle);Di2015NewLine        if (ret == 0)Di2015NewLine LSA_UNICODE_STRING[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LSA_UNICODE_STRING lsaRights = new LSA_UNICODE_STRING();Di2015NewLine            lsaRights.Buffer = rights;Di2015NewLine 10658411Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<Type> GetContractType(Type serviceType) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    if (HasServiceContract(serviceType))Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        yield return serviceType; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var contractInterfaceTypes = serviceType.GetInterfaces() Di2015NewLine        .Where(i => HasServiceContract(i));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var type in contractInterfaceTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if you want, you can also go to the service base class,Di2015NewLine    // interface inheritance, etc.Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool HasServiceContract(Type type) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    return Attribute.IsDefined(type, typeof(ServiceContractAttribute), false); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10658931Di2015UniqueSeparatorIComparer<byte[]>
10658931Di2015UniqueSeparator// I could be wrong in that this is called natural order.Di2015NewLineclass NaturalOrderByteArrayComparer : IComparer<byte[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(byte[] x, byte[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Shortcuts: If both are null, they are the same.Di2015NewLine        if (x == null && y == null) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If one is null and the other isn't, then theDi2015NewLine        // one that is null is "lesser".Di2015NewLine        if (x == null && y != null) return -1;Di2015NewLine        if (x != null && y == null) return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Both arrays are non-null.  Find the shorterDi2015NewLine        // of the two lengths.Di2015NewLine        int bytesToCompare = Math.Min(x.Length, y.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare the bytes.Di2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < bytesToCompare; ++index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The x and y bytes.Di2015NewLine            byte xByte = x[index];Di2015NewLine            byte yByte = y[index];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Compare result.Di2015NewLine            int compareResult = Comparer<byte>.Default.Compare(xByte, yByte);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If not the same, then return the result of theDi2015NewLine            // comparison of the bytes, as they were the sameDi2015NewLine            // up until now.Di2015NewLine            if (compareResult != 0) return compareResult;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // They are the same, continue.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The first n bytes are the same.  Compare lengths.Di2015NewLine        // If the lengths are the same, the arraysDi2015NewLine        // are the same.Di2015NewLine        if (x.Length == y.Length) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compare lengths.Di2015NewLine        return x.Length < y.Length ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10658931Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<foo> OrderBySortField(this IEnumerable<foo> items, Di2015NewLine    int sortLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Validate parameters.Di2015NewLine    if (items == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("items");Di2015NewLine    if (sortLength < 0) throw Di2015NewLine        new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("sortLength", sortLength,Di2015NewLine            "The sortLength parameter must be a non-negative value.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Shortcut, if sortLength is zero, return the sequence, as-is.Di2015NewLine    if (sortLength == 0) return items;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The ordered enumerable.Di2015NewLine    IOrderedEnumerable<foo> ordered = items.OrderBy(i => i.sort[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Cycle from the second index on.Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 1; index < sortLength; index++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Copy the index.Di2015NewLine        int indexCopy = index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sort by the next item in the array.Di2015NewLine        ordered = ordered.ThenBy(i => i.sort[indexCopy]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the ordered enumerable.Di2015NewLine    return ordered;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10658931Di2015UniqueSeparator// You have to supply the length of the array you're sorting on.Di2015NewLineList<foo> sortedFoo = FooSource().Di2015NewLine    OrderBySortField(sortLength).ToList();Di2015NewLine

part.ToString() : path + '.' + part;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void BuildVariablesList(object obj, string path, Dictionary<string, string> result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( obj is ArrayList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var arrayObj = obj as ArrayList;Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i<arrayObj.Count; i++ )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                BuildVariablesList(arrayObj[i], AppendToPathString(path,i), result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }else if ( obj is Dictionary<string, object>)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var dictObject = obj as Dictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var entry in dictObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (entry.Value is String && (path.Trim().Length > 0 || !ReservedFieldNames.Contains( entry.Key.ToLower())))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result.Add(AppendToPathString(path,entry.Key), entry.Value as String);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (entry.Value is Dictionary<string, object>)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BuildVariablesList(entry.Value as Dictionary<string, object>, AppendToPathString(path, entry.Key), result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (entry.Value is ArrayList)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BuildVariablesList(entry.Value as ArrayList, AppendToPathString(path, entry.Key), result);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10662063Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate void ResizeImage(Image img, double maxWidth, double maxHeight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double srcWidth = img.Source.Width;Di2015NewLine    double srcHeight = img.Source.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double resizeWidth = srcWidth;Di2015NewLine    double resizeHeight = srcHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double aspect = resizeWidth / resizeHeight;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (resizeWidth > maxWidth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        resizeWidth = maxWidth;Di2015NewLine        resizeHeight = resizeWidth / aspect;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (resizeHeight > maxHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        aspect = resizeWidth / resizeHeight;Di2015NewLine        resizeHeight = maxHeight;Di2015NewLine        resizeWidth = resizeHeight * aspect;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    img.Width = resizeWidth;Di2015NewLine    img.Height = resizeHeight;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10662389Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void picBox_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point p = ConvertFromChildToForm(e.X, e.Y, picBox);Di2015NewLine        iOldX = p.X;Di2015NewLine        iOldY = p.Y;Di2015NewLine        iClickX = e.X;Di2015NewLine        iClickY = e.Y;Di2015NewLine        clicked = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void picBox_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (clicked)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point p = new Point(); // New CoordinateDi2015NewLine        p.X =  e.X + picBox.Left;Di2015NewLine        p.Y =  e.Y + picBox.Top;Di2015NewLine        picBox.Left = p.X - iClickX;Di2015NewLine        picBox.Top = p.Y - iClickY;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void picBox_MouseUp(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    clicked = false;   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Point ConvertFromChildToForm(int x, int y, Control control)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Point p = new Point(x, y);Di2015NewLine    control.Location = p;Di2015NewLine    return p;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10666082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void MakePath(ref List<string> routes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool is_first, is_last;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < routes.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        is_first = true;Di2015NewLine        is_last = true;Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < routes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             if (routes[i][1] == routes[j][0]){Di2015NewLine                is_last = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             if (routes[i][0] == routes[j][1]){Di2015NewLine                is_start = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (is_first) {Di2015NewLine             var temp = routes[i];Di2015NewLine             routes[i] = routes[0];Di2015NewLine             routes[0] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (is_last) {Di2015NewLine             var temp = routes[i];Di2015NewLine             routes[i] = routes[routes.Count];Di2015NewLine             routes[routes.Count] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }           Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < routes.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < routes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (routes[i][1] == routes[j][0])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var temp = routes[i + 1];Di2015NewLine                routes[i + 1] = routes[j];Di2015NewLine                routes[j] = temp;Di2015NewLine                j = routes.Count;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10670545Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Update() {Di2015NewLine        Vector Force = new Vector(0, 0);Di2015NewLine        foreach (GravObject g in Form.Objects) {Di2015NewLine            if (this != g)Di2015NewLine                Force += GetGravEffect(g);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double TimeElapsedSinceLastUpdate = Form.Timer.Interval * 0.001;Di2015NewLine        Vector acceleration = Force / Mass;Di2015NewLine        Velocity += acceleration*TimeElapsedSinceLastUpdate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        X = (X + Velocity.X * Form.VelocityScale);Di2015NewLine        Y = (Y + Velocity.Y * Form.VelocityScale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (X + Mass * Form.DrawScale >= Form.Panels.Panel2.Width || X - Mass * Form.DrawScale <= 0)Di2015NewLine            Velocity.X *= -1;Di2015NewLine        if (Y + Mass * Form.DrawScale >= Form.Panels.Panel2.Height || Y - Mass * Form.DrawScale <= 0)Di2015NewLine            Velocity.Y *= -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10675605Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static PagingModel<T> Page<T>(this IEnumerable<T> query, int page, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RavenQueryStatistics stats = null;Di2015NewLine        if (page < 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Page is one-based and must be greater than zero");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (query is IRavenQueryable<T>)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var rQuery = (IRavenQueryable<T>)query;Di2015NewLine            rQuery.Statistics(out stats);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = queryDi2015NewLine            .Skip((page - 1) * count)Di2015NewLine            .Take(count)Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var total = stats == null ? query.Count() : stats.TotalResults;Di2015NewLine        return new PagingModel<T>()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Page = page,Di2015NewLine            Rows = results,Di2015NewLine            TotalPages = (int)Math.Ceiling((double)total / (double)count)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10679464Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IList<T>> Buffer<T>(this IEnumerable<T> orig, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return orig.Select((o,i) => new { o, i })Di2015NewLine               .GroupBy(x => x.i / count, x => x.o)Di2015NewLine               .Select(g => g.ToList());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10682262Di2015UniqueSeparatorfetch

10682262Di2015UniqueSeparatorMaybe<T>
10682262Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IObservable<R> FromCacheOrFetch<T, R>(this IObservable<T> source, Func<T, R> cache, Func<IObservable<T>, IObservable<R>> fetch, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine        where R : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.FromCacheOrFetch<T, R>(t => cache(t).ToMaybe(null), fetch, scheduler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IObservable<R> FromCacheOrFetch<T, R>(this IObservable<T> source, Func<T, Maybe<R>> cache, Func<IObservable<T>, IObservable<R>> fetch, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var results = new Subject<R>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var disposables = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var loop = new EventLoopScheduler();Di2015NewLine        disposables.Add(loop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sourceDone = false;Di2015NewLine        var pairsDone = true;Di2015NewLine        var exception = (Exception)null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fetchIn = new Subject<T>();Di2015NewLine        var fetchOut = (IObservable<R>)null;Di2015NewLine        var pairs = (IObservable<KeyValuePair<int, R>>)null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lookup = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<Maybe<R>>();Di2015NewLine        var cursor = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action checkCleanup = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sourceDone && pairsDone)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (exception == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    results.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    results.OnError(exception);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                loop.Schedule(() => disposables.Dispose());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action dequeue = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (cursor != list.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var mr = list[cursor];Di2015NewLine                if (mr.HasValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    results.OnNext(mr.Value);Di2015NewLine                    cursor++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<KeyValuePair<int, R>> nextPairs = kvp =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list[kvp.Key] = Maybe<R>.Something(kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine            dequeue();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Exception> errorPairs = ex =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fetchIn.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            pairsDone = true;Di2015NewLine            exception = ex;Di2015NewLine            checkCleanup();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action completedPairs = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pairsDone = true;Di2015NewLine            checkCleanup();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<T> sourceNext = t =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var mr = cache(t);Di2015NewLine            list.Add(mr);Di2015NewLine            if (mr.IsNothing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lookup[t] = list.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine                if (fetchOut == null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pairsDone = false;Di2015NewLine                    fetchOut = fetch(fetchIn.ObserveOn(Scheduler.ThreadPool));Di2015NewLine                    pairs = fetchIn.Select(x => lookup[x]).Zip(fetchOut, (i, r2) => new KeyValuePair<int, R>(i, r2));Di2015NewLine                    disposables.Add(pairs.ObserveOn(loop).Subscribe(nextPairs, errorPairs, completedPairs));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                fetchIn.OnNext(t);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Exception> errorSource = ex =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sourceDone = true;Di2015NewLine            exception = ex;Di2015NewLine            fetchIn.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            checkCleanup();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action completedSource = () =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sourceDone = true;Di2015NewLine            fetchIn.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine            checkCleanup();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        disposables.Add(source.ObserveOn(loop).Subscribe(sourceNext, errorSource, completedSource));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return results.ObserveOn(scheduler);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ctors.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                throw Di2015NewLine                    new Exception(Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MySetMemberBinder : SetMemberBinder {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MySetMemberBinder(string name) : base(name, false) { 10689268Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Assembly clrAssembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(@"Path\\to\\your\\assembly.dll");Di2015NewLine  string sql = CreateFunctionsFromAssembly(clrAssembly, permissionSetType.UNSAFE);Di2015NewLine  File.WriteAllText(sqlFile, sql);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// permissions available for an assembly dll in sql serverDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic enum permissionSetType { SAFE, EXTERNAL_ACCESS, UNSAFE };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// generate sql from an assembly dll with all functions with attribute SqlFunctionDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="clrAssembly">assembly object</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="permissionSet">sql server permission set</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>sql script</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string CreateFunctionsFromAssembly(Assembly clrAssembly, permissionSetType permissionSet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string sqlTemplate = @"Di2015NewLine      -- Delete all functions from assembly '{0}'Di2015NewLine      DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine      SET @sql = 'DROP FUNCTION ' + STUFF(Di2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine            SELECTDi2015NewLine                ', ' + assembly_method Di2015NewLine            FROMDi2015NewLine                sys.assembly_modulesDi2015NewLine            WHEREDi2015NewLine                assembly_id IN (SELECT assembly_id FROM sys.assemblies WHERE name = '{0}')Di2015NewLine            FOR XML PATH('')Di2015NewLine        ), 1, 1, '')Di2015NewLine      IF @sql IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_executesql @sqlDi2015NewLine      GODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      -- Delete existing assembly '{0}' if necessaryDi2015NewLine      IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sys.assemblies WHERE name = '{0}')Di2015NewLine        DROP ASSEMBLY {0};Di2015NewLine      GODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      {1}Di2015NewLine      GODi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      -- Create all functions from assembly '{0}'Di2015NewLine    ";Di2015NewLine    string assemblyName = clrAssembly.GetName().Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sql = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sql.AppendFormat(sqlTemplate, assemblyName, CreateSqlFromAssemblyDll(clrAssembly, permissionSet));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Type classInfo in clrAssembly.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (MethodInfo methodInfo in classInfo.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Attribute.IsDefined(methodInfo, typeof(SqlFunctionAttribute)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder methodParameters = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                bool firstParameter = true;Di2015NewLine                foreach (ParameterInfo paramInfo in methodInfo.GetParameters())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (firstParameter)Di2015NewLine                         firstParameter = false;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        methodParameters.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine                    methodParameters.AppendFormat(@"@{0} {1}", paramInfo.Name, ConvertClrTypeToSql(paramInfo.ParameterType));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                string returnType = ConvertClrTypeToSql(methodInfo.ReturnParameter.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine                string methodName = methodInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine                string className = (classInfo.Namespace == null ? "" : classInfo.Namespace + ".") + classInfo.Name;Di2015NewLine                string externalName = string.Format(@"{0}.[{1}].{2}", assemblyName, className, methodName);Di2015NewLine                sql.AppendFormat(@"CREATE FUNCTION {0}({1}) RETURNS {2} AS EXTERNAL NAME {3};"Di2015NewLine                                , methodName, methodParameters, returnType, externalName)Di2015NewLine                   .Append("\\nGO\\n");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sql.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Generate sql script to create assemblyDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="clrAssembly"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="permissionSet">sql server permission set</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string CreateSqlFromAssemblyDll(Assembly clrAssembly, permissionSetType permissionSet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const string sqlTemplate = @"Di2015NewLine      -- Create assembly '{0}' from dllDi2015NewLine      CREATE ASSEMBLY [{0}] Di2015NewLine        AUTHORIZATION [dbo]Di2015NewLine        FROM 0x{2}Di2015NewLine        WITH PERMISSION_SET = {1};Di2015NewLine    ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder bytes = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream dll = File.OpenRead(clrAssembly.Location))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int @byte;Di2015NewLine        while ((@byte = dll.ReadByte()) >= 0)Di2015NewLine            bytes.AppendFormat("{0:X2}", @byte);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string sql = String.Format(sqlTemplate, clrAssembly.GetName().Name, permissionSet, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sql;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Convert clr type to sql typeDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="clrType">clr type</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>sql type</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string ConvertClrTypeToSql(Type clrType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (clrType.Name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "SqlString":Di2015NewLine            return "NVARCHAR(MAX)";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlDateTime":Di2015NewLine            return "DATETIME";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlInt16":Di2015NewLine            return "SMALLINT";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlInt32":Di2015NewLine            return "INTEGER";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlInt64":Di2015NewLine            return "BIGINT";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlBoolean":Di2015NewLine            return "BIT";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlMoney":Di2015NewLine            return "MONEY";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlSingle":Di2015NewLine            return "REAL";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlDouble":Di2015NewLine            return "DOUBLE";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlDecimal":Di2015NewLine            return "DECIMAL(18,0)";Di2015NewLine        case "SqlBinary":Di2015NewLine            return "VARBINARY(MAX)";Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(clrType.Name + " is not a valid sql type.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10689524Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TElement, bool>> BuildLikeExpression<TElement>( Expression<Func<TElement, string>> valueSelector, string value )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ( valueSelector == null )Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException( "valueSelector" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var method = GetLikeMethod( value );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Call( method, Expression.Constant( value ), valueSelector.Body );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parameter = valueSelector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine    var expressionConvert = Expression.Convert( Expression.Constant( 0 ), typeof( int? ) );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TElement, bool>>( Expression.GreaterThan( body, expressionConvert ), parameter );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10694356Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void TestService()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string loginAddress = "<login url>";Di2015NewLine        string serviceAddress = "<service url>";Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest req = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(loginAddress);Di2015NewLine        req.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine        string userName = "<user>";Di2015NewLine        string password = "<password>";Di2015NewLine        CookieContainer cc = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine        req.CookieContainer = cc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(@"__VIEWSTATE=<viewstate>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(@"&__EVENTVALIDATION=<event validation>");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(@"&ctl00$MainContent$LoginUser$UserName={0}&ctl00$MainContent$LoginUser$Password={1}");Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(@"&ctl00$MainContent$LoginUser$LoginButton=Log In");Di2015NewLine        string postData = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        postData = String.Format(postData, userName, password);Di2015NewLine        req.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        Encoding encoding = new ASCIIEncoding();Di2015NewLine        byte[] requestData = encoding.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine        req.ContentLength = requestData.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //write the post data to the requestDi2015NewLine        using (Stream reqStream = req.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            reqStream.Write(requestData, 0, requestData.Length);Di2015NewLine            reqStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse(); //second call, the service requestDi2015NewLine        Stream data = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(data);Di2015NewLine        string s = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        if (ex.Response != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Stream strm = ex.Response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            byte[] bytes = new byte[strm.Length];Di2015NewLine            strm.Read(bytes, 0, (int)strm.Length);Di2015NewLine            string sResponse = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(sResponse);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10698418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Reverse(Array array, int index, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (array == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("array");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if ((index < array.GetLowerBound(0)) || (length < 0))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException((index < 0) ? "index" : "length", Environment.GetResourceString("ArgumentOutOfRange_NeedNonNegNum"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if ((array.Length - (index - array.GetLowerBound(0))) < length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Environment.GetResourceString("Argument_InvalidOffLen"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (array.Rank != 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new RankException(Environment.GetResourceString("Rank_MultiDimNotSupported"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!TrySZReverse(array, index, length))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int num = index;Di2015NewLine        int num2 = (index + length) - 1;Di2015NewLine        object[] objArray = array as object[];Di2015NewLine        if (objArray == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (num < num2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object obj3 = array.GetValue(num);Di2015NewLine                array.SetValue(array.GetValue(num2), num);Di2015NewLine                array.SetValue(obj3, num2);Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine                num2--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (num < num2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object obj2 = objArray[num];Di2015NewLine                objArray[num] = objArray[num2];Di2015NewLine                objArray[num2] = obj2;Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine                num2--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10702934Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte [] bArray = new byte[] {11, 67, 67, 67, 33, 34, 67, 67, 11, 33, 67, 67, 67, 67};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] result = Replace(bArray, new byte[] {67, 67, 67}, new byte[] {90});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte [] Replace(byte[] input, byte[] pattern, byte[] replacement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pattern.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return input;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<byte> result = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (i = 0; i <= input.Length - pattern.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool foundMatch = true;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < pattern.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (input[i + j] != pattern[j])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foundMatch = false;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (foundMatch)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.AddRange(replacement);Di2015NewLine                i += pattern.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add(input[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (; i < input.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(input[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10708753Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void IsEqual<T>(T Value1, T Value2) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(T) == typeof(String))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (String.Compare(Value1.ToString(), Value2.ToString(), true) != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("Fail");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (0 != Value1.CompareTo(Value2))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("Fail");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
