10709993Di2015UniqueSeparatorServer
10709993Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate TcpListener _listener;Di2015NewLineprivate const int port = 8000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void Worker_TcpListener(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  BackgroundWorker worker = sender as BackgroundWorker;Di2015NewLine  do {Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine      _listener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, port);Di2015NewLine      _listener.Start();Di2015NewLine      TcpClient client = _listener.AcceptTcpClient(); // waits until data is avaiableDi2015NewLine      int MAX = client.ReceiveBufferSize;Di2015NewLine      NetworkStream stream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine      Byte[] buffer = new Byte[MAX];Di2015NewLine      int len = stream.Read(buffer, 0, MAX);Di2015NewLine      if (0 < len) {Di2015NewLine        string data = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLine        worker.ReportProgress(len, data.Substring(0, len));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      stream.Close();Di2015NewLine      client.Close();Di2015NewLine    } catch (SocketException) {Di2015NewLine      // See MSDN: Windows Sockets V2 API Error Code Doc for details of error codeDi2015NewLine    } catch (ThreadAbortException) { // If I have to call Abort on this threadDi2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    } finally {Di2015NewLine      _listener.Stop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } while (!worker.CancellationPending);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10709993Di2015UniqueSeparatorReportProcess
10709993Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Worker_TcpListener(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine  if (e.UserState != null) {Di2015NewLine    int len = e.ProgressPercentage;Di2015NewLine    string data = e.UserState.ToString();Di2015NewLine    if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(data) && (3 < len)) {Di2015NewLine      string head = data.Substring(0, 3);Di2015NewLine      string item = data.Substring(3);Di2015NewLine      if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(item)) {Di2015NewLine        if (head == "BP:") {Di2015NewLine          string[] split = data.Split(';');Di2015NewLine          if (2 < split.Length) {Di2015NewLine            string box = split[0].Substring(3); // Box NumberDi2015NewLine            string qty = split[1].Substring(2); // QuantityDi2015NewLine            string customer = split[2].Substring(2); // Customer NameDi2015NewLine            MyRoutine(box, qty, customer);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10709993Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Sub SendToServer(string serialNum, int qty, string customer)Di2015NewLine  Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursorDi2015NewLine  TryDi2015NewLine    Dim strPacket As String = String.Format("BP:{0};Q:{1};C:{2};", serialNum, qty, customer)Di2015NewLine    Dim colon As Integer = p7_txtIPAddress.Text.IndexOf(":")Di2015NewLine    Dim host As String = p7_txtIPAddress.Text.Substring(0, colon)Di2015NewLine    Dim port As Integer = CInt(p7_txtIPAddress.Text.Substring(colon + 1))Di2015NewLine    Dim dataPacket As [Byte]() = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(strPacket)Di2015NewLine    Using client As New TcpClient(host, port)Di2015NewLine      Dim stream As NetworkStream = client.GetStream()Di2015NewLine      stream.Write(dataPacket, 0, dataPacket.Length)Di2015NewLine    End UsingDi2015NewLine  Catch err As ExceptionDi2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(err.Message, "Print To Server TCP Error")Di2015NewLine  FinallyDi2015NewLine    Cursor.Current = Cursors.DefaultDi2015NewLine  End TryDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

10716017Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<MethodDeclarationSyntax> BobsFilter(SyntaxTree tree)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var compilation = Compilation.Create("test", syntaxTrees: new[] { tree });Di2015NewLine        var model = compilation.GetSemanticModel(tree);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var types = new[] { SpecialType.System_Boolean, SpecialType.System_Void };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var methods = tree.Root.DescendentNodes().OfType<MethodDeclarationSyntax>();Di2015NewLine        var publicInternalMethods = methods.Where(m => m.Modifiers.Any(t => t.Kind == SyntaxKind.PublicKeyword || t.Kind == SyntaxKind.InternalKeyword));Di2015NewLine        var withoutParameters = publicInternalMethods.Where(m => !m.ParameterList.Parameters.Any());Di2015NewLine        var withReturnBoolOrVoid = withoutParameters.Where(m => types.Contains(model.GetSemanticInfo(m.ReturnType).ConvertedType.SpecialType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return withReturnBoolOrVoid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10718456Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    public static int CancelCount;Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        int count = 1000 * 1000 * 10;Di2015NewLine        for (int ix = 0; ix < count; ++ix) {Di2015NewLine            var token = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine            token.CancelAfter(500);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (CancelCount < count) {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(CancelCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class Extensions {Di2015NewLine    public static void CancelAfter(this CancellationTokenSource source, int dueTime) {Di2015NewLine        Timer timer = new Timer(delegate(object self) {Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Increment(ref Program.CancelCount);Di2015NewLine            ((IDisposable)self).Dispose();Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                source.Cancel();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ObjectDisposedException) {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        timer.Change(dueTime, -1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10719085Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a virtual directory on the specified web siteDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="serverName">name of server</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="siteId">Site Id</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="directoryName">Virtual Directory Name</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="physicalPath">physical path of directory</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bAnonymousLogon">Integrated Windows authentication or Anonymous Logon</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="defaultDoc">The default document for the site.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The Virtual Directory</returns>Di2015NewLine    public DirectoryEntry CreateVirtualDirectory(string serverName, int siteId, string directoryName, string physicalPath, bool bAnonymousLogon, string defaultDoc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Does the directory exist already?Di2015NewLine            DirectoryEntry vDir = GetVirtualDirectory(serverName, siteId, directoryName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (vDir != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Yes, it does, no need to createDi2015NewLine                _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirAlreadyExists, directoryName, siteId));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // No, we have some creating to doDi2015NewLine                DirectoryEntry root = new DirectoryEntry("IIS://" + serverName + "/W3SVC/" + siteId.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture) + "/Root");Di2015NewLine                vDir = root.Children.Add(directoryName, IisVirtualDirectory);Di2015NewLine                vDir.CommitChanges();Di2015NewLine                _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreated, directoryName, siteId));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Created or not, we want to set the virtual directory's propertiesDi2015NewLine            // We take a risk here by using literals rather than variables (need to make sure theDi2015NewLine            // log value is the same as the actual entry)Di2015NewLine            // But its not really much of a risk - the main reason for logging is to record progressDi2015NewLine            // through the "set" operationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreatePath, physicalPath));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["Path"][0] = physicalPath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAccessRead, true.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AccessRead"][0] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAccessExecute, true.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AccessExecute"][0] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAccessWrite, false.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AccessWrite"][0] = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAccessScript, false.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AccessScript"][0] = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAuthNtlm, (!bAnonymousLogon).ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AuthNTLM"][0] = !bAnonymousLogon;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAuthAnon, bAnonymousLogon.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AuthAnonymous"][0] = bAnonymousLogon;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateDefaultDoc, true.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["EnableDefaultDoc"][0] = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(defaultDoc))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateDefaultDoc,Di2015NewLine                                          defaultDoc.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine                vDir.Properties["DefaultDoc"][0] = defaultDoc + ",default.htm,default.aspx,default.asp";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateDirBrowse, false.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture)));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["EnableDirBrowsing"][0] = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAppFriendlyName, directoryName));Di2015NewLine            vDir.Properties["AppFriendlyName"][0] = directoryName;    // The name of the applicationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_InstalledIISVersion >= IisVersion.Iis6)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateAppPool, directoryName));Di2015NewLine                vDir.Properties["AppPoolId"][0] = directoryName;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Commit the changes to the directoryDi2015NewLine            vDir.CommitChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create out-of-process applicationDi2015NewLine            vDir.Invoke("AppCreate", false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(VirDirCreateSetUp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return vDir;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirCreateException, directoryName, siteId));Di2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(ex);Di2015NewLine            throw ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10719085Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the directory entry exists on the specified siteDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="serverName">name of server</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="siteId">site id</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="directoryName">virtual directory name</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>the Virtual Directory, if it exists, otherwise null</returns>Di2015NewLine    private DirectoryEntry GetVirtualDirectory(string serverName, int siteId, string directoryName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DirectoryEntry root = new DirectoryEntry("IIS://" + serverName + "/W3SVC/" + siteId.ToString(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture) + "/Root");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DirectoryEntry entry in root.Children)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (0 == String.Compare(directoryName, entry.Name, true, CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirFound, directoryName, serverName));Di2015NewLine                    return entry;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirNotFound, directoryName, serverName));Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, VirDirException, directoryName, siteId, serverName));Di2015NewLine            _Logger.Log(ex);Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10720141Di2015UniqueSeparator// Note: to use this, you'd need to make sure that *both* sequences are sorted.Di2015NewLine// You could either sort TwoThousandIntegerList in place, or use LINQ's OrderByDi2015NewLine// method.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<T> SortedIntersect<T>(this IEnumerable<T> first,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> second) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var firstIterator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!firstIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var secondIterator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!secondIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            T firstValue = firstIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            T secondValue = secondIterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int comparison = firstValue.CompareTo(secondValue);Di2015NewLine                if (comparison == 0) // firstValue == secondValueDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return firstValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (comparison < 0) // firstValue < secondValueDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!firstIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    firstValue = firstIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else // firstValue > secondValueDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!secondIterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    secondValue = secondIterator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }  Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10720205Di2015UniqueSeparatorobjects.Count(m  => m.Key == "A") * objects.Count(m => m.Key == "D")
10720205Di2015UniqueSeparator// The result listDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<IList<KeyValuePair<char, int>>> result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If there are no requestedKeys there is no result expectedDi2015NewLineif(requestedKeys.Count() > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Loop through all request keys to cross join them togetherDi2015NewLine    foreach (var key in requestedKeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (result == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // First time the innerlist List<KeyValuePair<char, int>> will contain 1 itemDi2015NewLine            // Don't forget to use ToList() otherwise the expression will be executed to late.Di2015NewLine            result = objects.Where(m => m.Key == key).Select(m => new List<KeyValuePair<char, int>>() { m }).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Except for the first time the next subresult will be cross joinedDi2015NewLine            var subresult = objects.Where(m => m.Key == key).Select(m => new List<KeyValuePair<char, int>>() { m });Di2015NewLine            result = result.Join(Di2015NewLine                subresult,Di2015NewLine                l1 => 0, // This and the next parameter does the cross join trickDi2015NewLine                l2 => 0, // This and the previous parameter does the cross join trickDi2015NewLine                (l1, l2) => l1.Concat(l2).ToList() // Concat both lists which causes previous list plus one new added itemDi2015NewLine                ).ToList(); // Again don't forget to 'materialize' (I don't know it is called materialization in LINQ-to-Objects Di2015NewLine                            // but it has simular behaviors because the expression needs to be executed right away)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }           Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinereturn result;Di2015NewLine

10720799Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double acc = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var il = ILFact();Di2015NewLine        il.Invoke(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var et = ETFact();Di2015NewLine        et(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int k = 0; k < 10; k++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long time1, time2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Restart();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 30000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = CSharpFact(i);Di2015NewLine                acc += result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            time1 = sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Restart();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 30000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double result = il.Invoke(i);Di2015NewLine                acc += result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            time2 = sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Restart();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 30000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = et(i);Di2015NewLine                acc += result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0,6} {1,6} {2,6}", time1, time2, sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("\\n{0}...\\n", acc);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Func<int, int> ILFact()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var method = new DynamicMethod(Di2015NewLine        "factorial", typeof(int),Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(int) }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var il = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine        var result = il.DeclareLocal(typeof(int));Di2015NewLine        var startWhile = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine        var returnResult = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // result = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_1);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if (value <= 1) branch endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.MarkLabel(startWhile);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_1);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ble_S, returnResult);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // result *= (value--)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, result);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Dup);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4_1);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Sub);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Starg_S, 0);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Mul);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // end whileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Br_S, startWhile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // return resultDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        il.MarkLabel(returnResult);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, result);Di2015NewLine        il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Func<int, int>)method.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<int, int>));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Func<int, int> ETFact()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Creating a parameter expression.Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression value = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Creating an expression to hold a local variable. Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression result = Expression.Parameter(typeof(int), "result");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Creating a label to jump to from a loop.Di2015NewLine        LabelTarget label = Expression.Label(typeof(int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Creating a method body.Di2015NewLine        BlockExpression block = Expression.Block(Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Adding a local variable.Di2015NewLine        new[] { result },Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Assigning a constant to a local variable: result = 1Di2015NewLine        Expression.Assign(result, Expression.Constant(1)),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Adding a loop.Di2015NewLine        Expression.Loop(Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Adding a conditional block into the loop.Di2015NewLine        Expression.IfThenElse(Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Condition: value > 1Di2015NewLine        Expression.GreaterThan(value, Expression.Constant(1)),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If true: result *= value --Di2015NewLine        Expression.MultiplyAssign(result,Di2015NewLine        Expression.PostDecrementAssign(value)),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If false, exit from loop and go to a label.Di2015NewLine        Expression.Break(label, result)Di2015NewLine        ),Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Label to jump to.Di2015NewLine        labelDi2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compile an expression tree and return a delegate.Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<int, int>>(block, value).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int CSharpFact(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int result = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (value > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result *= value--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10722496Di2015UniqueSeparatorint k;Di2015NewLinefor(int i=0; i<N; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // start sum with zeroDi2015NewLine    y[i]=0;Di2015NewLine    // below diagonalDi2015NewLine    k=i;Di2015NewLine    for(int j=0; j<=i-1; j++)Di2015NewLine    {                    Di2015NewLine        y[i]+=A[k]*x[j];Di2015NewLine        k+=N-j-1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // above diagonalDi2015NewLine    k=i*N-i*(i+1)/2+i;Di2015NewLine    for(int j=i; j<=N-1; j++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        y[i]+=A[k]*x[j];Di2015NewLine        k++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10722641Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ys = new[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 4, 3, 4, 5, 4 };Di2015NewLine    var indices = GetMinIndices(ys);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<int> GetMinIndices(int[] ys)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var minIndices = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    for (var index = 1; index < ys.Length; index++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentY = ys[index];Di2015NewLine        var previousY = ys[index - 1];Di2015NewLine        if (index < ys.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var neytY = ys[index + 1];Di2015NewLine            if (previousY > currentY && neytY > currentY) // neighbors are greaterDi2015NewLine                minIndices.Add(index); // add the index to the listDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else // we're at the last indexDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (previousY > currentY) // previous is greaterDi2015NewLine                minIndices.Add(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return minIndices;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10725528Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string PlainTextToRtf(string plainText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  string escapedPlainText = plainText.Replace(@"\\", @"\\\\").Replace("{", @"\\{").Replace("}", @"\\}");Di2015NewLine  string rtf = @"{\\rtf1\\ansi{\\fonttbl\\f0\\fswiss Helvetica;}\\f0\\pard ";Di2015NewLine  rtf += escapedPlainText.Replace(Environment.NewLine, @" \\par ");Di2015NewLine  rtf += " }";Di2015NewLine  return rtf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10725760Di2015UniqueSeparatorx
10725760Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Ordenar<T>(IEnumerable<T> query, Di2015NewLine    string columna, string orden)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!(String.IsNullOrEmpty(orden) || String.IsNullOrEmpty(columna)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo orderField = typeof(T).GetField(columna);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (orden == "ASC")Di2015NewLine            return query.OrderBy(x => orderField.GetValue(x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (orden == "DESC")Di2015NewLine            return query.OrderByDescending(x => orderField.GetValue(x));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10738903Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction<T>

10738903Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action d = () => Console.WriteLine("Hi");Di2015NewLine        Execute(d); // Prints "Hi"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<string> d2 = (s) => Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine        Execute(d2, "Lo"); // Prints "Lo"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<string, string> d3 = (s) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine            return "Done";Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        var result = (string)Execute(d3, "Spaghettio"); // Prints "Spaghettio"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result); // Prints "Done"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static object Execute(Delegate d, params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return d.DynamicInvoke(args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10739219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetCombinations(int[] set, int sum, string values) {Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < set.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine    int left = sum - set[i];Di2015NewLine    string vals = set[i] + "," + values;Di2015NewLine    if (left == 0) {Di2015NewLine      yield return vals;Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine      int[] possible = set.Take(i).Where(n => n <= sum).ToArray();Di2015NewLine      if (possible.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in GetCombinations(possible, left, vals)) {Di2015NewLine          yield return s;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10740797Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<int> t1 = new List<int>() { 5, 6, 7, 8 };Di2015NewLineList<int> t2 = new List<int>() { 6, 8, 9, 10 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar operations = Di2015NewLine    t1.GroupJoin(Di2015NewLine        t2, Di2015NewLine        t1i => t1i, Di2015NewLine        t2i => t2i, Di2015NewLine        (t1i, t2join) => new { Id = t1i, Action = !t2join.Any() ? 10740797Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar toModify = t1.Union(t2).Except(t1.Intersect(t2));Di2015NewLinemods = string.Join(",", toModify.ToArray());Di2015NewLine// Pass mods (comma separated list) to your sproc.Di2015NewLine
10740797Di2015UniqueSeparator-- @delimitedIDs some unbounded text type, in case you have a LOT of recordsDi2015NewLine-- I use XQuery to build the table (found it's faster than some other methods)Di2015NewLineDECLARE @idTable TABLE (ID int, AddRecord bit)Di2015NewLineDECLARE @xmlString XMLDi2015NewLineSET @xmlString = CAST('<NODES><NODE>' + REPLACE(@delimitedIDs, ',', '</NODE><NODE>') + '</NODE></NODES>' as XML)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO @idTable (ID)Di2015NewLineSELECT node.value('.','int') Di2015NewLineFROM @xmlString.nodes('//NODE') as xs(node)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUPDATE idDi2015NewLineSET AddRecord = CASE WHEN someTable.ID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 ENDDi2015NewLineFROM @idTable id LEFT OUTER JOIN [SomeTable] someTable on someTable.ID = id.IDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDELETE aDi2015NewLineFROM [SomeTable] a JOIN @idTable b ON b.ID = a.ID AND b.AddRecord = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO [SomeTable] (ID)Di2015NewLineSELECT id FROM @idTable WHERE AddRecord = 1Di2015NewLine

10742173Di2015UniqueSeparatorx_low
10742173Di2015UniqueSeparatorx_high
10742173Di2015UniqueSeparator// Integrate function f(x) using the trapezoidal rule between x=x_low..x_highDi2015NewLinedouble Integrate(Func<double,double> f, double x_low, double x_high, int N_steps)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double h = (x_high-x_low)/N_steps;Di2015NewLine    double res = (f(x_low)+f(x_high))/2;Di2015NewLine    for(int i=1; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        res += f(x_low+i*h);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return h*res;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10743649Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] RetrieveIv(string encryptedBase64)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // We don't need to base64-decode everything... just 16 bytes-worthDi2015NewLine    encryptedBase64 = encryptedBase64.Substring(0, 24);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This will be 18 bytes long (4 characters per 3 bytes)Di2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedBinary = Convert.FromBase64String(encryptedBase64);Di2015NewLine    byte[] iv = new byte[16];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(encryptedBinary, 0, iv, 0, 16);Di2015NewLine    return iv;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10743705Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegisteredWaitHandle

10743705Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunQuery(QueryState queryState)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // Start the operation.Di2015NewLine  var asyncResult = queryState.Query.BeginExecuteSegmented(NoopAsyncCallback, queryState);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Register a callback.Di2015NewLine  RegisteredWaitHandle shared = null;Di2015NewLine  RegisteredWaitHandle produced = ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(asyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle,Di2015NewLine    (state, timedout) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var asyncResult = opState as IAsyncResult;Di2015NewLine      var state = asyncResult.AsyncState as QueryState;Di2015NewLine      while (true)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Keep reading until the value is no longer null.Di2015NewLine        RegisteredWaitHandle consumed = Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref shared, null, null);Di2015NewLine        if (consumed != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          consumed.Unregister(asyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle);Di2015NewLine          break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }, asyncResult, queryTimeout, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Publish the RegisteredWaitHandle so that the callback can see it.Di2015NewLine  Interlocked.CompareExchange(ref shared, produced, null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10744837Di2015UniqueSeparatordeclare @T1 table (XMLCol xml, TargetID int);Di2015NewLinedeclare @T2 table (XMLCol xml, TargetID int);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemerge Table1 as TDi2015NewLineusing (select T1.XMLCol.query('*'),Di2015NewLine              T1.XMLCol.value('@col1', 'char(1)'),Di2015NewLine              T1.XMLCol.value('@col2', 'char(1)')Di2015NewLine       from @XML.nodes('/root/table1') as T1(XMLCol)) as S(XMLCol, Col1, Col2)Di2015NewLineon 1 = 0Di2015NewLinewhen not matched thenDi2015NewLine  insert (Col1, Col2) values (S.Col1, S.Col2)Di2015NewLineoutput S.XMLCol, inserted.Table1ID into @T1;          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemerge Table2 as TDi2015NewLineusing (select T2.XMLCol.query('*'),Di2015NewLine              T1.TargetID,Di2015NewLine              T2.XMLCol.value('@col1', 'char(1)'),Di2015NewLine              T2.XMLCol.value('@col2', 'char(1)')Di2015NewLine       from @T1 as T1  Di2015NewLine         cross apply T1.XMLCol.nodes('table2Array/table2') as T2(XMLCol)) as S(XMLCol, ID1, Col1, Col2)Di2015NewLineon 1 = 0Di2015NewLinewhen not matched thenDi2015NewLine  insert (Table1ID, Col1, Col2) values (S.ID1, S.Col1, S.Col2)Di2015NewLineoutput S.XMLCol, inserted.Table2ID into @T2;          Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinsert into Table3(Table2ID, Col1, Col2)Di2015NewLineselect T2.TargetID,Di2015NewLine       T3.XMLCol.value('@col1', 'char(1)'),Di2015NewLine       T3.XMLCol.value('@col2', 'char(2)') Di2015NewLinefrom @T2 as T2Di2015NewLine  cross apply T2.XMLCol.nodes('table3array/table3') as T3(XMLCol);Di2015NewLine

10744962Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class OrderComparer<T> : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region IComparer<string> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetOrderableValue(x.Split('-').First()).CompareTo(GetOrderableValue(y.Split('-').First()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int GetOrderableValue(string value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] splitValue = value.Split('.');Di2015NewLine            int orderableValue = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (splitValue.Length.Equals(1))Di2015NewLine                orderableValue = int.Parse(splitValue[0]) * 1000;Di2015NewLine            else if (splitValue.Length.Equals(2))Di2015NewLine                orderableValue = int.Parse(splitValue[0]) * 1000 + int.Parse(splitValue[1]) * 100;Di2015NewLine            else if (splitValue.Length.Equals(3))Di2015NewLine                orderableValue = int.Parse(splitValue[0]) * 1000 + int.Parse(splitValue[1]) * 100 + int.Parse(splitValue[2]) * 10;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                orderableValue = int.Parse(splitValue[0]) * 1000 + int.Parse(splitValue[1]) * 100 + int.Parse(splitValue[2]) * 10 + int.Parse(splitValue[3]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return orderableValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10754562Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[] offsets = new int[128];Di2015NewLineint[] plusOffsets = new int[128];Di2015NewLinedouble[] poii = new double[128];Di2015NewLinedouble[] ioip = new double[128];Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 128; i++) {Di2015NewLine    offsets[i] = (i / SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR) * SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR;Di2015NewLine    plusOffsets[i] = SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR + offsets[i];Di2015NewLine    double poioi = (double) (plusOffsets[i] - offsets[i]);Di2015NewLine    poii[i] = ((plusOffsets[i] - i) / poioi);Di2015NewLine    ioip[i] = ((i - offsets[i]) / poioi);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat[, ,] DensityMap = new float[128, 128, 128];Di2015NewLinefloat[, ,] PressureMap = new float[128, 128, 128];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < g_CraftWorldConstants.RegionSizeX; x++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int offsetX = offsets[x];Di2015NewLine    int plusOffsetX = plusOffsets[x];Di2015NewLine    double poxxpoxox = poii[x];Di2015NewLine    double xoxpoxox = ioip[x];Di2015NewLine    bool xModNot0 = !(x % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR == 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < g_CraftWorldConstants.RegionSizeY; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int offsetY = offsets[y];Di2015NewLine        int plusOffsetY = plusOffsets[y];Di2015NewLine        double poyypoyoy = poii[y];Di2015NewLine        double yoypoyoy = ioip[y];Di2015NewLine        bool yModNot0 = !(y % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_VERT == 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int z = 0; z < g_CraftWorldConstants.RegionSizeZ; z++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //if (!(x % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR == 0 && y % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_VERT == 0 && z % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR == 0))Di2015NewLine            if (xModNot0 || yModNot0 || !(z % SAMPLE_RATE_3D_HOR == 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int offsetZ = offsets[z];Di2015NewLine                int plusOffsetZ = plusOffsets[z];Di2015NewLine                double pozzpozoz = poii[z];Di2015NewLine                double zozpozoz = ioip[z];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double x00 = poxxpoxox * DensityMap[offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ] + xoxpoxox * DensityMap[plusOffsetX, offsetY, offsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x10 = poxxpoxox * DensityMap[offsetX, offsetY, plusOffsetZ] + xoxpoxox * DensityMap[plusOffsetX, offsetY, plusOffsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x01 = poxxpoxox * DensityMap[offsetX, plusOffsetY, offsetZ] + xoxpoxox * DensityMap[plusOffsetX, plusOffsetY, offsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x11 = poxxpoxox * DensityMap[offsetX, plusOffsetY, plusOffsetZ] + xoxpoxox * DensityMap[plusOffsetX, plusOffsetY, plusOffsetZ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double r0 = poyypoyoy * x00 + yoypoyoy * x01;Di2015NewLine                double r1 = poyypoyoy * x10 + yoypoyoy * x11;Di2015NewLine                DensityMap[x, y, z] = (float)(pozzpozoz * r0 + zozpozoz * r1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double x02 = poxxpoxox * PressureMap[offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ] + xoxpoxox * PressureMap[plusOffsetX, offsetY, offsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x12 = poxxpoxox * PressureMap[offsetX, offsetY, plusOffsetZ] + xoxpoxox * PressureMap[plusOffsetX, offsetY, plusOffsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x03 = poxxpoxox * PressureMap[offsetX, plusOffsetY, offsetZ] + xoxpoxox * PressureMap[plusOffsetX, plusOffsetY, offsetZ];Di2015NewLine                double x13 = poxxpoxox * PressureMap[offsetX, plusOffsetY, plusOffsetZ] + xoxpoxox * PressureMap[plusOffsetX, plusOffsetY, plusOffsetZ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double r2 = poyypoyoy * x02 + yoypoyoy * x03;Di2015NewLine                double r3 = poyypoyoy * x12 + yoypoyoy * x13;Di2015NewLine                PressureMap[x, y, z] = (float)(pozzpozoz * r2 + zozpozoz * r3);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10754585Di2015UniqueSeparator<col[\\\\s]*name=\\"?([0-9a-zA-Z ]*)\\"?>((.|\\n)*?)</col>Di2015NewLine

10756810Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CachingQuery<T> : IQueryable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CachingQueryProvider _provider;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression _expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CachingQuery(CachingQueryProvider provider, Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _provider = provider;Di2015NewLine        _expression = expression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // etc.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass CachingQueryProvider : IQueryProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IQueryProvider _original;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CachingQueryProvider(IQueryProvider original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _original = original;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // etc.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class CachedQueryableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IQuerable<T> AsCached(this IQueryable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new CachingQuery<T>(Di2015NewLine             new CachingQueryProvider(source.Provider), Di2015NewLine             source.Expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10756810Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CachingQueryProvider : IQueryProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Execute(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = TranslateExpressionToCacheKey(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object cachedValue;Di2015NewLine        if (_cache.TryGetValue(key, out cachedValue))Di2015NewLine            return cachedValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object result = _originalProvider.Execute(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Won't compile because we don't know T at compile timeDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<T> sequence = result as IEnumerable<T>;Di2015NewLine        if (sequence != null && !(sequence is ICollection<T>)) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = sequence.ToList<T>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _cache[key] = result; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10757195Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct EntityGroupKeyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public int ID {get;set;}Di2015NewLine  public string Name {get;set;}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class EntityGrouperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public Func<Entity, EntityGroupKey> KeySelector {get;set;}Di2015NewLine  public Func<EntityGroupKey, TreeViewItem> ResultSelector {get;set;}Di2015NewLine  public EntityGrouper NextGrouping {get;set;} //null indicates leaf levelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public List<TreeViewItem> GetItems(IEnumerable<Entity> source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var query =Di2015NewLine      from x in sourceDi2015NewLine      group x by KeySelector(x) into gDi2015NewLine      let subItems = NextGrouping == null ?Di2015NewLine        new List<TreeViewItem>() :Di2015NewLine        NextGrouping.GetItems(g)Di2015NewLine      select new { Item = ResultSelector(g.Key), SubItems = subItems };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<TreeViewItem> result = new List<TreeViewItem>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var queryResult in query)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine          // wire up the subitemsDi2015NewLine      queryResult.Item.SubItems = queryResult.SubItems Di2015NewLine      result.Add(queryResult.Item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10758461Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void EliminateDuplicates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Eliminate the duplicates    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < results.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < results.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!(results[i].Equals(results[j])))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char[] rev = results[j].ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine                    char[] forward = results[i].ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine                    Array.Reverse(rev);Di2015NewLine                    bool bEqual = true;Di2015NewLine                    for( int n = 0 ; n < results[j].Length && true == bEqual ; n++ )Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if( rev[n] != forward[n] )Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            bEqual = false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if( true == bEqual)Di2015NewLine                        results.Remove(results[j] );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var result in results)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Total number of elements is : {0} ", results.Count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10758822Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class YourForm : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private sealed class YourDataDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public string SubKeyName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private ConcurrentQueue<YourData> queue = new ConcurrentQueue<YourData>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void StartTreeViewUpdate_Click(object sender, EventArgs args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(WorkerThread);Di2015NewLine    TreeViewUpdateTimer.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void TreeViewUpdateTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Update in batches of 100 (or whatever) so that the UI staysDi2015NewLine    // responsive.Di2015NewLine    treeView1.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      YourData value = null;Di2015NewLine      if (queue.TryDequeue(value) && value != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        treeView1.Nodes[value.SubKeyName].Nodes.Add(value.Value, value.Value)Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // We're done.Di2015NewLine        TreeViewUpdateTimer.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    treeView1.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void WorkerThread()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    using (RegistryKey key = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(registry_key))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      foreach (string subkey_name in key.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        using (RegistryKey subkey = key.OpenSubKey(subkey_name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          foreach (string a in (string[])subkey.GetValue("Users", ""))Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            User u = new User(a);Di2015NewLine            usrs.addUser(new User(a));Di2015NewLine            wgs.addUserToWorkgroup(subkey_name, a);Di2015NewLine            usrs.AddWorkGroupToUser(subkey_name, a);Di2015NewLine            var data = new YourData();Di2015NewLine            data.SubKeyName = subkey_name;Di2015NewLine            data.Value = a;Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(data);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          queue.Enqueue(null); // Indicate that queueing is done.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

      : this(2, true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Constructor with parametersDi2015NewLine        ///                return decimalNumbers;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                decimalNumbers = value > 0 ? value : 0;Di2015NewLine      return Convert.ToDecimal(Text);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            set { Text = value.ToString(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ///      Changed(this);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Property of hasNegativesDi2015NewLine        ///     }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hasNegatives = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Property of formatDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string FormatDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return format;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                format = "^";Di2015NewLine                format += HasNegatives ? "(\\\\" + getNegativeSign() + "?)" : "";Di2015NewLine                format += "(\\\\d*)";Di2015NewLine                if (DecimalNumbers > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    format += "(\\\\" + getDecimalSeparator() + "?)";Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 1; i <= DecimalNumbers; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        format += "(\\\\d?)";Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                format += "$";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method PreProcessMessageDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="msg">ref Message</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>bool</returns>Di2015NewLine        public override bool PreProcessMessage(ref Message msg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (msg.Msg == WM_KEYDOWN)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Keys keys = (Keys)msg.WParam.ToInt32();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool numbers = ModifierKeys != Keys.ShiftDi2015NewLine                                && (keys >= Keys.D0 && keys <= Keys.D9Di2015NewLine                                    || (keys >= Keys.NumPad0 && keys <= Keys.NumPad9));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool dec = ModifierKeys != Keys.ShiftDi2015NewLine                            && (keys == Keys.DecimalDi2015NewLine                                || keys == Keys.OemcommaDi2015NewLine                                || keys == Keys.OemPeriod);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool negativeSign = (keys == Keys.OemMinus && ModifierKeys != Keys.Shift)Di2015NewLine                                    || keys == Keys.Subtract;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool home = keys == Keys.Home;Di2015NewLine                bool end = keys == Keys.End;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool ctrlZ = keys == Keys.Z && ModifierKeys == Keys.Control;Di2015NewLine                bool ctrlX = keys == Keys.X && ModifierKeys == Keys.Control;Di2015NewLine                bool ctrlC = keys == Keys.C && ModifierKeys == Keys.Control;Di2015NewLine                bool ctrlV = keys == Keys.V && ModifierKeys == Keys.Control;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool del = keys == Keys.Delete;Di2015NewLine                bool bksp = keys == Keys.Back;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool tab = keys == Keys.Tab;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bool arrows = keys == Keys.UpDi2015NewLine                              || keys == Keys.DownDi2015NewLine                              || keys == Keys.LeftDi2015NewLine                              || keys == Keys.Right;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (numbers || del || bksp || arrows || home || endDi2015NewLine                    || ctrlC || ctrlX || ctrlV || ctrlZ)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (dec)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return DecimalNumbers <= 0;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (negativeSign)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return !HasNegatives;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (tab)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                return base.PreProcessMessage(ref msg);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                return true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return base.PreProcessMessage(ref msg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method WndProcDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="m">ref Message</param>Di2015NewLine        protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == WM_PASTE)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IDataObject obj = Clipboard.GetDataObject();Di2015NewLine                string input = (string)obj.GetData(typeof(string));Di2015NewLine                string pasteText = getPosibleText(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!isValidadFormat(pasteText))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m.Result = (IntPtr)0;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method OnKeyPressDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">KeyPressEventArgs</param>Di2015NewLine        protected override void OnKeyPress(KeyPressEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnKeyPress(e);Di2015NewLine            string keyInput = e.KeyChar.ToString();Di2015NewLine            string inputText = getPosibleText(keyInput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Char.IsDigit(e.KeyChar)Di2015NewLine                || keyInput.Equals(getDecimalSeparator())Di2015NewLine                || keyInput.Equals(getNegativeSign()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = !isValidadFormat(inputText);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (e.KeyChar == '\\b'Di2015NewLine                    || e.KeyChar == '\\t'Di2015NewLine                    || keyInput.Equals(Keys.Delete.ToString())Di2015NewLine                    || keyInput.Equals(Keys.Home.ToString())Di2015NewLine                    || keyInput.Equals(Keys.End.ToString()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Allow backspace, tab, delete, home, endDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (e.KeyChar == 26Di2015NewLine                     || e.KeyChar == 24Di2015NewLine                     || e.KeyChar == 3Di2015NewLine                     || e.KeyChar == 22)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // 26 : Allow Ctrl+Z | 24 : Allow Ctrl+XDi2015NewLine                //  3 : Allow Ctrl+C | 22 : Allow Ctrl+VDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //DisallowDi2015NewLine                e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method OnTextChangedDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">System.EventArgs</param>Di2015NewLine        protected override void OnTextChanged(System.EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (getFloatValue() < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.ForeColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.ForeColor = Color.Black;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If the decimal point is preceded by a no number is added zeroDi2015NewLine            if (this.Text.StartsWith(getNegativeSign() + getDecimalSeparator()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Text = getNegativeSign() + "0" + this.Text.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine                this.Select(3, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.Text.StartsWith(getDecimalSeparator()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.Text = "0" + this.Text;Di2015NewLine                    this.Select(2, 0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.OnTextChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method for validate text with formatDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="text">text</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>is valid format</returns>Di2015NewLine        private bool isValidadFormat(string text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Regex.IsMatch(text, Format);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method for get deciamal        /// Method for get negative signDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Negative Sign of current culture</returns>Di2015NewLine        private string getNegativeSign()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.NumberFormat.NegativeSign;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Method for get posible resulting text for input textDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="text">string with input 10760190Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass C : B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass D : B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass My1  {Di2015NewLine    public My1(List<B> lessDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // This is totally legalDi2015NewLine       lessDerivedTemplateParameter.Add(new D());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass My2 : My1 {Di2015NewLine    public My2(List<C> moreDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine        // if this were allowed, then My1 could add a D to a list of BsDi2015NewLine        : base(moreDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10760190Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IA<out T> { Di2015NewLine    public T GetSome();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass C : B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass D : B { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass My1  {Di2015NewLine    public My1(IA<B> lessDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // This is totally legalDi2015NewLine       var someB = lessDerivedTemplateParameter.GetSome();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass My2 : My1 {Di2015NewLine    public My2(IA<C> moreDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine        // This is allowed, because an A<C> only *produces* C's (which are also B's)Di2015NewLine        // so the base class (which consumes B's, and doesnt care if they are C's) Di2015NewLine        // can use an IA<C>Di2015NewLine        : base(moreDerivedTemplateParameter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10760233Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var setter = CreatePropertySetter(typeof (User), "Name");Di2015NewLine    var obj = new User();Di2015NewLine    setter(obj, "Fred");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Action<object, object> CreatePropertySetter(Type targetType, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var target = Expression.Parameter(typeof (object), "obj");Di2015NewLine    var value = Expression.Parameter(typeof (object), "value");Di2015NewLine    var property = targetType.GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Assign(Di2015NewLine        Expression.Property(Expression.Convert(target, property.DeclaringType), property),Di2015NewLine        Expression.Convert(value, property.PropertyType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<object, object>>(body, target, value);Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10760233Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var setter = CreatePropertySetter<User,string>("Name");Di2015NewLine    var obj = new User();Di2015NewLine    setter(obj, "Fred");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Action<TType, TValue> CreatePropertySetter<TType, TValue>(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var target = Expression.Parameter(typeof (TType), "obj");Di2015NewLine    var value = Expression.Parameter(typeof (TValue), "value");Di2015NewLine    var property = typeof(TType).GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    var body = Expression.Assign(Di2015NewLine        Expression.Property(target, property),Di2015NewLine        value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Action<TType, TValue>>(body, target, value);Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10761937Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static ISessionFactory CreateSessionFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string conStringName = "ConnectionString";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // http://weblogs.asp.net/ricardoperes/archive/2010/03/31/speeding-up-nhibernate-startup-time.aspxDi2015NewLine        System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter serializer = new System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        NHibernate.Cfg.Configuration cfg = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (File.Exists("Configuration.serialized"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream stream = File.OpenRead("Configuration.serialized"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cfg = serializer.Deserialize(stream) as Configuration;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // file not exists, configure normally, and serialize NH configuration to diskDi2015NewLine            cfg = Fluently.Configure()Di2015NewLine                .Database(MsSqlConfiguration.MsSql2008Di2015NewLine                .ConnectionString(c => c.FromConnectionStringWithKey(conStringName)))Di2015NewLine                .Mappings(m => m.FluentMappings.Add<Entity1>())Di2015NewLine                .Mappings(m => m.FluentMappings.Add<Entity2>())Di2015NewLine                .Mappings(m => m.FluentMappings.Add<Entity3>())Di2015NewLine                .ExposeConfiguration(p => p.SetProperty("current_session_context_class", "web"))Di2015NewLine                .BuildConfiguration();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Stream stream = File.OpenWrite("Configuration.serialized"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                serializer.Serialize(stream, cfg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cfg.BuildSessionFactory();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10761937Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Application_BeginRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // we open one NH session for every web request, Di2015NewLine    var nhsession = SessionFactory.OpenSession();Di2015NewLine    // and bind it to the SessionFactory current sessionDi2015NewLine    CurrentSessionContext.Bind(nhsession);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Application_EndRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // close/unbind at EndRequestDi2015NewLine    if (SessionFactory != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nhsession = CurrentSessionContext.Unbind(SessionFactory);Di2015NewLine        nhsession.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10762567Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[]
10762567Di2015UniqueSeparatornew int[]
10762567Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<int[]> Permutation(int[] bounds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  for(int num0s = bounds.Length; num0s >= 0; --num0s)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    foreach(int[] ret in PermHelper(num0s, 0, bounds, new int[bounds.Length]))Di2015NewLine      yield return ret;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic IEnumerable<int[]> PermHelper(int num0s, int index, int[] bounds, int[] result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //Last index.Di2015NewLine  if(index == bounds.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(num0s > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      result[index] = 0;Di2015NewLine      yield return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for(int i = 1; i < bounds[index]; ++i)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        result[index] = i;Di2015NewLine        yield return result;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  //Others.Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //still need more 0s.Di2015NewLine    if(num0s > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      result[index] = 0;Di2015NewLine      foreach(int[] perm in PermHelper(num0s - 1, index + 1, bounds, result))Di2015NewLine        yield return perm;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Make sure there are enough 0s left if this one isn't a 0.Di2015NewLine    if(num0s < bounds.Length - index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for(int i = 1; i < bounds[index]; ++i)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        result[index] = i;Di2015NewLine        foreach(int[] perm in PermHelper(num0s, index + 1, bounds, result))Di2015NewLine          yield return perm;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10767282Di2015UniqueSeparatortry {Di2015NewLine    Regex regexObj = new Regex(@"(?<=SSID\\s*\\d+ :\\s*)(?<value>\\S+)");Di2015NewLine    Match matchResults = regexObj.Match(subjectString);Di2015NewLine    while (matchResults.Success) {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < matchResults.Groups.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine            Group groupObj = matchResults.Groups[i];Di2015NewLine            if (groupObj.Success) {Di2015NewLine                // matched text: groupObj.ValueDi2015NewLine                // match start: groupObj.IndexDi2015NewLine                // match length: groupObj.LengthDi2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        matchResults = matchResults.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} catch (ArgumentException ex) {Di2015NewLine    // Syntax error in the regular expressionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10767282Di2015UniqueSeparator@"Di2015NewLine(?<=         # Assert that the regex below can be matched, with the match ending at this position (positive lookbehind)Di2015NewLine   SSID         # Match the characters SSID? literallyDi2015NewLine   \\s           # Match a single character that is a whitespace character? (spaces, tabs, and line breaks)Di2015NewLine      *            # Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy)Di2015NewLine   \\d           # Match a single digit 0..9Di2015NewLine      +            # Between one and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy)Di2015NewLine   \\ :          # Match the characters  :? literallyDi2015NewLine   \\s           # Match a single character that is a whitespace character? (spaces, tabs, and line breaks)Di2015NewLine      *            # Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine(?<value>    # Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name value?Di2015NewLine   \\S           # Match a single character that is a non-whitespace character?Di2015NewLine      +            # Between one and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine"Di2015NewLine
10767295Di2015UniqueSeparator        } // asking for a } hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public new string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           return (FirstName + ',' + LastName + ',' + CustomerID);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10767295Di2015UniqueSeparator        }// asking for a } hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public new string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (FirstName + ',' + LastName + ',' + CustomerID);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10769608Di2015UniqueSeparator DateTime GetLastExecutionTime(ObjectContext context, string fileName)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    var query = from file in context.FilesDi2015NewLine                    join history in context.FileHistories Di2015NewLine                        on file.FileID equals history.FileIDDi2015NewLine                    join job in context.Jobs Di2015NewLine                        on history.JobID equals job.JobIDDi2015NewLine                    where file.FileName == fileNameDi2015NewLine                    select job.ExecutedOn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = query.Max();Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

10769988Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var x = NtpClient.GetNetworkTime();Di2015NewLine   x.Dump();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Static class to receive the time from a NTP server.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class NtpClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the current DateTime from time-a.nist.gov.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A DateTime containing the current time.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetNetworkTime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetNetworkTime("time.windows.com"); // time-a.nist.govDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the current DateTime from <paramref name="ntpServer"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ntpServer">The hostname of the NTP server.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A DateTime containing the current time.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetNetworkTime(string ntpServer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress[] address = Dns.GetHostEntry(ntpServer).AddressList;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(address == null || address.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Could not resolve ip address from '" + ntpServer + "'.", "ntpServer");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IPEndPoint ep = new IPEndPoint(address[0], 123);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return GetNetworkTime(ep);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the current DateTime form <paramref name="ep"/> IPEndPoint.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ep">The IPEndPoint to connect to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A DateTime containing the current time.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static DateTime GetNetworkTime(IPEndPoint ep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Socket s = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Dgram, ProtocolType.Udp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        s.Connect(ep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] ntpData = new byte[48]; // RFC 2030 Di2015NewLine        ntpData[0] = 0x1B;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < 48; i++)Di2015NewLine            ntpData[i] = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        s.Send(ntpData);Di2015NewLine        s.Receive(ntpData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte offsetTransmitTime = 40;Di2015NewLine        ulong intpart = 0;Di2015NewLine        ulong fractpart = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= 3; i++)Di2015NewLine            intpart = 256 * intpart + ntpData[offsetTransmitTime + i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 4; i <= 7; i++)Di2015NewLine            fractpart = 256 * fractpart + ntpData[offsetTransmitTime + i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ulong milliseconds = (intpart * 1000 + (fractpart * 1000) / 0x100000000L);Di2015NewLine        s.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TimeSpan timeSpan = TimeSpan.FromTicks((long)milliseconds * TimeSpan.TicksPerMillisecond);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime dateTime = new DateTime(1900, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        dateTime += timeSpan;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TimeSpan offsetAmount = TimeZone.CurrentTimeZone.GetUtcOffset(dateTime);Di2015NewLine        DateTime networkDateTime = (dateTime + offsetAmount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return networkDateTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10770138Di2015UniqueSeparator  List<Packet> allPackets =Di2015NewLine     new List<Packet>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:00:00"), sourceIp = "a"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:00:01"), sourceIp = "a"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:00:01"), sourceIp = "a"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:01:00"), sourceIp = "a"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:00:00"), sourceIp = "b"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:01:00"), sourceIp = "b"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:02:00"), sourceIp = "b"},Di2015NewLine           new Packet {arrivalDate = DateTime.Parse("2000-01-01 0:03:00"), sourceIp = "b"},Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine  var xPackets = 2;Di2015NewLine  var interval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // We group all the packets by ip, then within that, order the packets by date.Di2015NewLine  var ips =Di2015NewLine     allPacketsDi2015NewLine        .GroupBy(Di2015NewLine           p => p.sourceIp,Di2015NewLine           (ip, packets) => newDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                   ip,Di2015NewLine                                   packets = packets.OrderBy(p => p.arrivalDate).ToList()Di2015NewLine                                })Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine  // Build a list of IPs with at least x packets in y interval.Di2015NewLine  var rapidIps = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var ipPacket in ips)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     for (int i = 0, j = xPackets; j < ipPacket.packets.Count; i++, j++)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (ipPacket.packets[i].arrivalDate + interval >= ipPacket.packets[j].arrivalDate)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           rapidIps.Add((ipPacket.ip));Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

10773878Di2015UniqueSeparator    static string GetPrettyDate(DateTime d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // 1.Di2015NewLine        // Get time span elapsed since the date.Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan s = DateTime.Now.Subtract(d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 2.Di2015NewLine        // Get total number of days elapsed.Di2015NewLine        int dayDiff = (int)s.TotalDays;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 3.Di2015NewLine        // Get total number of seconds elapsed.Di2015NewLine        int secDiff = (int)s.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 4.Di2015NewLine        // Don't allow out of range values.Di2015NewLine        if (dayDiff < 0 || dayDiff >= 31)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 5.Di2015NewLine        // Handle same-day times.Di2015NewLine        if (dayDiff == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // A.Di2015NewLine            // Less than one minute ago.Di2015NewLine            if (secDiff < 60)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "just now";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // B.Di2015NewLine            // Less than 2 minutes ago.Di2015NewLine            if (secDiff < 120)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "1 minute ago";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // C.Di2015NewLine            // Less than one hour ago.Di2015NewLine            if (secDiff < 3600)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("{0} minutes ago",Di2015NewLine                    Math.Floor((double)secDiff / 60));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // D.Di2015NewLine            // Less than 2 hours ago.Di2015NewLine            if (secDiff < 7200)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "1 hour ago";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // E.Di2015NewLine            // Less than one day ago.Di2015NewLine            if (secDiff < 86400)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("{0} hours ago",Di2015NewLine                    Math.Floor((double)secDiff / 3600));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // 6.Di2015NewLine        // Handle previous days.Di2015NewLine        if (dayDiff == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "yesterday";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (dayDiff < 7)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0} days ago",Di2015NewLine            dayDiff);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (dayDiff < 31)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("{0} weeks ago",Di2015NewLine            Math.Ceiling((double)dayDiff / 7));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10773988Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IntPtr NativeUtf8FromString(string managedString) {Di2015NewLine        int len = Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount(managedString);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[len + 1];Di2015NewLine        Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(managedString, 0, managedString.Length, buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine        IntPtr nativeUtf8 = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(buffer, 0, nativeUtf8, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        return nativeUtf8;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string StringFromNativeUtf8(IntPtr nativeUtf8) {Di2015NewLine        int len = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (Marshal.ReadByte(nativeUtf8, len) != 0) ++len;Di2015NewLine        if (len == 0) return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[len - 1];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(nativeUtf8, buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

        }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.IsCumulative)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double num2 = (double)(animationClock.CurrentIteration - 1).Value;Di2015NewLine            if (num2 > 0.0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LinearGradientBrush value3 = }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private LinearGradientBrush GetDefaultLinearGradientBrush(LinearGradientBrush brush)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinearGradientBrush returnBrush = new
