  {Di2015NewLine                this._animationType = AnimationType.FromTo;Di2015NewLine                this._keyValues = new LinearGradientBrush[2];Di2015NewLine                this._keyValues[0] = this.From;Di2015NewLine                this._keyValues[1] = this.To;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.By !=        elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this._animationType = AnimationType.From;Di2015NewLine                    this._keyValues = new LinearGradientBrush[1];Di2015NewLine                    this._keyValues[0] = this.From;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object GetCurrentValue(object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, AnimationClock animationClock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("defaultDestinationValue");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return GetCurrentValue(LinearGradientBrush defaultOriginValue, LinearGradientBrush defaultDestinationValue, AnimationClock animationClock)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.ReadPreamble();Di2015NewLine        if (animationClock == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("animationClock");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (animationClock.CurrentState == ClockState.Stopped)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return defaultDestinationValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.GetCurrentValueCore(defaultOriginValue, defaultDestinationValue, animationClock);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public new LinearGradientAnimation Clone()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (LinearGradientAnimation)base.Clone();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Freezable CreateInstanceCore()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new LinearGradientAnimation();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // AnimationTimeline / Freezable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Helper MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static LinearGradientBrush AddLinearGradientBrush(LinearGradientBrush brush1, LinearGradientBrush brush2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinearGradientBrush gradientBrush = new LinearGradientBrush();Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.StartPoint = AddPoint(brush1.StartPoint, brush2.StartPoint);Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.EndPoint = AddPoint(brush1.EndPoint, brush2.EndPoint);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < brush1.GradientStops.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GradientStop gradientStop1 = brush1.GradientStops[i];Di2015NewLine            GradientStop gradientStop2 = brush2.GradientStops[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Color color = AddColor(gradientStop1.Color, gradientStop2.Color);Di2015NewLine            double offset = AddDouble(gradientStop1.Offset, gradientStop2.Offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gradientBrush.GradientStops.Add(new GradientStop(color, offset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return gradientBrush;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static LinearGradientBrush SubtractLinearGradientBrush(LinearGradientBrush brush1, LinearGradientBrush brush2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinearGradientBrush gradientBrush = new LinearGradientBrush();Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.StartPoint = SubtractPoint(brush1.StartPoint, brush2.StartPoint);Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.EndPoint = SubtractPoint(brush1.EndPoint, brush2.EndPoint);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < brush1.GradientStops.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GradientStop gradientStop1 = brush1.GradientStops[i];Di2015NewLine            GradientStop gradientStop2 = brush2.GradientStops[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Color color = SubtractColor(gradientStop1.Color, gradientStop2.Color);Di2015NewLine            double offset = SubtractDouble(gradientStop1.Offset, gradientStop2.Offset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gradientBrush.GradientStops.Add(new GradientStop(color, offset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return gradientBrush;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static LinearGradientBrush ScaleLinearGradientBrush(LinearGradientBrush value, double factor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinearGradientBrush gradientBrush = new LinearGradientBrush();Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.StartPoint = ScalePoint(value.StartPoint, factor);Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.EndPoint = ScalePoint(value.EndPoint, factor);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < value.GradientStops.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = ScaleColor(value.GradientStops[i].Color, factor);Di2015NewLine            double offset = ScaleDouble(value.GradientStops[i].Offset, factor);Di2015NewLine            gradientBrush.GradientStops.Add(new GradientStop(color, offset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return gradientBrush;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static LinearGradientBrush InterpolateGradientBrush(LinearGradientBrush from, LinearGradientBrush to, double progress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LinearGradientBrush gradientBrush = new LinearGradientBrush();Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.StartPoint = InterpolatePoint(from.StartPoint, to.StartPoint, progress);Di2015NewLine        gradientBrush.EndPoint = InterpolatePoint(from.EndPoint, to.EndPoint, progress);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < from.GradientStops.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = InterpolateColor(from.GradientStops[i].Color, to.GradientStops[i].Color, progress);Di2015NewLine            double offset = InterpolateDouble(from.GradientStops[i].Offset, to.GradientStops[i].Offset, progress);Di2015NewLine            gradientBrush.GradientStops.Add(new GradientStop(color, offset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return gradientBrush;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static Color AddColor(Color value1, Color value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value1 + value2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static Color SubtractColor(Color value1, Color value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value1 - value2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static Color ScaleColor(Color value, double factor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value * (float)factor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static Color InterpolateColor(Color from, Color to, double progress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine value1 + value2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static double SubtractDouble(double value1, double value2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value1 - value2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static double ScaleDouble(double value, double factor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value * factor;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    internal static double InterpolateDouble(double from, double to, double progress)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return from + (to - from) * progress;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static 10778971Di2015UniqueSeparator// if the separator after the section name is always " -", this is the best way I've thought of, since it will work regardless of what's in the sectionNameDi2015NewLineinCorrectSection = Regex.IsMatch(line, @"^#" + sectionName + @"($| -)");Di2015NewLine// as long as the section name can't contain # or spaces, this will workDi2015NewLineinCorrectSection = line.Split('#', ' ')[1] == sectionName;Di2015NewLine// as long as only alphanumeric characters can ever make up the section name, this is goodDi2015NewLineinCorrectSection = Regex.IsMatch(line, @"^#" + sectionName + @"\\b");Di2015NewLine// the problem with this is that if you are searching for "head", it will find "headOther" and think it's a matchDi2015NewLineinCorrectSection = line.StartsWith("#" + sectionName);Di2015NewLine

10784365Di2015UniqueSeparatorLB_GETCOUNT
10784365Di2015UniqueSeparatorLB_GETTEXT
10784365Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError = false)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, uint Msg, IntPtr wParam, StringBuilder lParam); Di2015NewLineconst int LB_GETCOUNT = 0x018B;Di2015NewLineconst int LB_GETTEXT = 0x0189;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate List<string> GetListBoxContents(IntPtr listBoxHwnd)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int cnt = (int)SendMessage(listBoxHwnd, LB_GETCOUNT, IntPtr.Zero, null);Di2015NewLine  List<string> listBoxContent = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(256);Di2015NewLine    IntPtr getText = SendMessage(listBoxHwnd, LB_GETTEXT, (IntPtr)i, sb);Di2015NewLine    listBoxContent.Add(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return listBoxContent;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10788244Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HtmlSanitizerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IDictionary<string, string[]> _whitelist;Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<string> _deletableNodesXpath = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HtmlSanitizer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _whitelist = new Dictionary<string, string[]>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            {"a", new[] {"href", "target", "title"}},Di2015NewLine                            {"img", new[] {"src", "alt", "width", "height"}},Di2015NewLine                            {"iframe", new[] {"src", "width", "height", "frameborder", "allowfullscreen" }},Di2015NewLine                            {"strong", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"em", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"blockquote", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"b", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"p", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"ul", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"ol", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"li", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"div", new[] {"align"}},Di2015NewLine                            {"strike", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"u", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"sub", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"sup", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"table", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"tr", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"td", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"th", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"dd", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"dt", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"dl", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"h1", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"h2", null},Di2015NewLine                            {"h3", null},Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Sanitize(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input.Trim().Length < 1)Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        var htmlDocument = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        htmlDocument.LoadHtml(input);Di2015NewLine        SanitizeNode(htmlDocument.DocumentNode);Di2015NewLine        string xPath = CreateXPath();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return StripHtml(htmlDocument.DocumentNode.WriteTo().Trim(), xPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SanitizeChildren(HtmlNode parentNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = parentNode.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SanitizeNode(parentNode.ChildNodes[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Regex _srcAttribute = new Regex(@"^https?://[-a-z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;\\(\\)]+$", RegexOptions.Singleline | RegexOptions.IgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine                         | RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Regex _iframeSrc = new Regex(@"https?://(player.vimeo.com|www.youtube.com)/[-a-z0-9+&@#/%?=~_|!:,.;\\(\\)|\\s]+", RegexOptions.Singleline | RegexOptions.IgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine                         | RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SanitizeNode(HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.NodeType == HtmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_whitelist.ContainsKey(node.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!_deletableNodesXpath.Contains(node.Name))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //DeletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name.Replace("?",""));Di2015NewLine                    node.Name = "removeableNode";Di2015NewLine                    _deletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (node.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = node.Attributes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HtmlAttribute currentAttribute = node.Attributes[i];Di2015NewLine                    string[] allowedAttributes = _whitelist[node.Name];Di2015NewLine                    if (allowedAttributes != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!allowedAttributes.Contains(currentAttribute.Name))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // if img src ensure matches regex Di2015NewLine                        if (node.Name == "img" && currentAttribute.Name == "src")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (!_srcAttribute.IsMatch(currentAttribute.Value))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                // remove node Di2015NewLine                                node.Name = "removeableNode";Di2015NewLine                                _deletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // if iframe - ensure it within allowed src tags Di2015NewLine                        if (node.Name == "iframe" && currentAttribute.Name == "src")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (!_iframeSrc.IsMatch(currentAttribute.Value))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                // remove node Di2015NewLine                                node.Name = "removeableNode";Di2015NewLine                                _deletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string StripHtml(string html, string xPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument htmlDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        htmlDoc.LoadHtml(html);Di2015NewLine        if (xPath.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HtmlNodeCollection invalidNodes = htmlDoc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes(@xPath);Di2015NewLine            foreach (HtmlNode node in invalidNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node.ParentNode.RemoveChild(node, true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return htmlDoc.DocumentNode.WriteContentTo();Di2015NewLine        ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string CreateXPath()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string xPath = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _deletableNodesXpath.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i != _deletableNodesXpath.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                xPath += string.Format("//{0}|", _deletableNodesXpath[i].ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else xPath += string.Format("//{0}", _deletableNodesXpath[i].ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return xPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10789196Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Task RunProcessAsync(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // there is no non-generic TaskCompletionSourceDi2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var process = new ProcessDi2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                      StartInfo = { FileName = fileName },Di2015NewLine                      EnableRaisingEvents = trueDi2015NewLine                  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    process.Exited += (sender, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tcs.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine        process.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    process.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10790069Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static AsyncCallback GetResponseCallback(string xmlName)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    return (IAsyncResult asynchronousResult) =>{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest httpRequest = (HttpWebRequest)asynchronousResult.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    // End the operationDi2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)httpRequest.EndGetResponse(asynchronousResult);Di2015NewLine    Stream streamResponse = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine    StreamReader streamRead = new StreamReader(streamResponse);Di2015NewLine    string responseStream = streamRead.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var store = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var istream = new IsolatedStorageFileStream(@"tmp" + xmlName + ".xml", FileMode.OpenOrCreate, store))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var sw = new StreamWriter(istream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.Write(responseStream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close the stream objectDi2015NewLine    streamResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine    streamRead.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Release the HttpWebResponseDi2015NewLine    response.Close();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10790860Di2015UniqueSeparator    // In LoadContentDi2015NewLineRenderTarget2D lightmapRT = new RenderTarget2D(graphics.GraphicsDevice,Di2015NewLine                                                 128,Di2015NewLine                                                 128,Di2015NewLine                                                 false, //No mip-mappingDi2015NewLine                                                 SurfaceFormat.Color,Di2015NewLine                                                 DepthFormat.Depth24);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We now render to the lightmap in Render methodDi2015NewLinegraphics.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(lightmapRT);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Lightmap is black by defaultDi2015NewLinegraphics.GraphicsDevice.Clear(Color.Black);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use the sprite batch to draw quads with custom shaderDi2015NewLinespriteBatch.Begin(0, BlendState.Opaque, null, null, null, lightmapFx);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var light in lights)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Pass the light parameters to the shaderDi2015NewLine    lightmapFx.Parameters["Viewport"].SetValue(new Vector2(GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Width, GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Height));Di2015NewLine    lightmapFx.Parameters["Range"].SetValue(light.Range);Di2015NewLine    lightmapFx.Parameters["Intensity"].SetValue(light.Intensity);Di2015NewLine    lightmapFx.Parameters["LightColor"].SetValue(light.LightColor);Di2015NewLine    lightmapFx.Parameters["LightLocation"].SetValue(light.LightLocation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Render quadDi2015NewLine    spriteBatch.Draw(...);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinespriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLine
10790860Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat Range;Di2015NewLinefloat Intensity;Di2015NewLinefloat3 LightColor;Di2015NewLinefloat2 LightLocation;Di2015NewLinefloat2 Viewport;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct VStoPSDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float4 Position : POSITION0;Di2015NewLine    float2 TexCoord : TEXCOORD0;Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineVStoPS VS(in float4 color    : COLOR0,Di2015NewLine          in float2 texCoord : TEXCOORD0,Di2015NewLine          in float4 position : POSITION0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    VStoPS vsout = (VStoPS)0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Half pixel offset for correct texel centering.Di2015NewLine    vsout.Position.xy -= 0.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Viewport adjustment.Di2015NewLine    vsout.Position.xy = position.xy / Viewport;Di2015NewLine    vsout.Position.xy *= float2(2, -2);Di2015NewLine    vsout.Position.xy -= float2(1, -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Pass texcoords as isDi2015NewLine    vsout.TexCoord = texCoord;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return vsout;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefloat4 PS(VStoPS psin)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Do calculations hereDi2015NewLine    // Here I just set it to whiteDi2015NewLine    return float4(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetechnique MainDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    pass p0Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        VertexShader = compile vs_3_0 VS();Di2015NewLine        PixelShader = compile ps_3_0 PS();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10792012Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Save(Application incomingApp)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (incomingApp == null) { throw new ArgumentNullException("incomingApp"); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] groupIds = GetGroupIds(incomingApp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Application appToSave;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (incomingApp.IdForEf == 0)  // New appDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        appToSave = incomingApp;Di2015NewLine        // Clear groups, otherwise new groups will be added to the groups table.Di2015NewLine        appToSave.CustomVariableGroups.Clear();Di2015NewLine        this.Database.Applications.Add(appToSave);                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        appToSave = this.Database.ApplicationsDi2015NewLine                .Include(x => x.CustomVariableGroups)Di2015NewLine                .Single(x => x.IdForEf == incomingApp.IdForEf);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AddGroupsToApp(groupIds, appToSave);Di2015NewLine    this.Database.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void AddGroupsToApp(int[] groupIds, Application app)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    app.CustomVariableGroups.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<CustomVariableGroup> groupsFromDb2 =Di2015NewLine        this.Database.CustomVariableGroups.Where(g => groupIds.Contains(g.IdForEf)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (CustomVariableGroup group in groupsFromDb2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        app.CustomVariableGroups.Add(group);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int[] GetGroupIds(Application application)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] groupIds = new int[application.CustomVariableGroups.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (CustomVariableGroup group in application.CustomVariableGroups)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        groupIds[i] = group.IdForEf;Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return groupIds;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10795792Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void CompareBorderingTiles(Tile T)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (T is Water)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float leftBound = location.X - (Tile.TileWidth * Tile.TileScale);Di2015NewLine        float rightBound = location.X + (Tile.TileWidth * Tile.TileScale);Di2015NewLine        float upperBound = location.Y - (Tile.TileHieght * Tile.TileScale);Di2015NewLine        float bottomBound = location.Y + (Tile.TileHieght * Tile.TileScale);Di2015NewLine        if (T.GridLocation.X == leftBound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawstate = DrawState.Left;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (T.GridLocation.X == rightBound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawstate = DrawState.Right;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (T.GridLocation.Y == upperBound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawstate = DrawState.Upper;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (T.GridLocation.Y == bottomBound)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            drawstate = DrawState.Lower; Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    base.CompareBorderingTiles(T);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10796127Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void OnContainerPreviewDragOver(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FrameworkElement container = sender as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (container == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ScrollViewer scrollViewer = GetFirstVisualChild<ScrollViewer>(container);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (scrollViewer == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double tolerance = 60;Di2015NewLine    double verticalPos = e.GetPosition(container).Y;Di2015NewLine    double offset = 20;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (verticalPos < tolerance) // Top of visible list? Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Scroll upDi2015NewLine        scrollViewer.ScrollToVerticalOffset(scrollViewer.VerticalOffset - offset);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (verticalPos > container.ActualHeight - tolerance) //Bottom of visible list? Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Scroll downDi2015NewLine        scrollViewer.ScrollToVerticalOffset(scrollViewer.VerticalOffset + offset);     Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10798221Di2015UniqueSeparator(           # Start of groupDi2015NewLine  (?=.*\\d)      #   must contains one digit from 0-9Di2015NewLine  (?=.*[a-z])       #   must contains one lowercase charactersDi2015NewLine  (?=.*[A-Z])       #   must contains one uppercase charactersDi2015NewLine  (?=.*[@#$%])      #   must contains one special symbols in the list "@#$%"Di2015NewLine              .     #     match anything with previous condition checkingDi2015NewLine                {6,20}  #        length at least 6 characters and maximum of 20 Di2015NewLine)           # End of groupDi2015NewLine

10800753Di2015UniqueSeparator        private void UpdateUserInterface(double offset) {Di2015NewLine        var thumbItem = Thumb as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( _thumbStoryboard == null ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // UpdateLayout Method is update the ActualWidth Properity of the UI ElementsDi2015NewLine            this.UpdateLayout();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Applying the CompositeTransform on "thumbItem" UI ElementDi2015NewLine            thumbItem.RenderTransform = _thumbTransform;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setting the Render Transform Origin to be the Center of X and YDi2015NewLine            thumbItem.RenderTransformOrigin = new Point(0.5d, 0.5d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setting the target of the DoubleAnimation to be the Thumb CompositeTransformDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTarget(_thumbAnimation, _thumbTransform);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Setting the Targeted Properity of the DoubleAnimation to be The "TranslateX" ProperityDi2015NewLine            Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(_thumbAnimation, new PropertyPath("TranslateX"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Used QuinticEase instead of ExponentialEaseDi2015NewLine            // and Added EaseOut to make the animation be more smoother.Di2015NewLine            _thumbAnimation.EasingFunction = new QuinticEase(){ EasingMode = EasingMode.EaseOut };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Initializing the StoryboardDi2015NewLine            _thumbStoryboard = new Storyboard();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Specifing the Duration of the DoubleAnimation not the StoryBoardDi2015NewLine            _thumbAnimation.Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(500));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Adding the DoubleAnimation to the Children of the StoryboardDi2015NewLine            _thumbStoryboard.Children.Add(_thumbAnimation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculate the New Centered PositionDi2015NewLine        double newPos = offset - (thumbItem.ActualWidth / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the New DoubleAnimation "To" Value, Di2015NewLine        // There is no need to set the "From" Value since it'll automatically continue from the current TranslateX ValueDi2015NewLine        _thumbAnimation.To = newPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Begin the animation.Di2015NewLine        _thumbStoryboard.Begin();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10801173Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static AttributeValue Create(string xacmlDataType, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AttributeValue _attributeValue = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (xacmlDataType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#x500Name":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#ipAddress":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dnsName":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#xPathExpression":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<string> { Value = value };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#boolean":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<bool> {Value = XmlConvert.ToBoolean(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<int> { Value = XmlConvert.ToInt32(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#double":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<double> { Value = XmlConvert.ToDouble(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#time":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#date":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<DateTime> { Value = XmlConvert.ToDateTime(value, XmlDateTimeSerializationMode.Utc) };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#anyURI":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<Uri> { Value = new Uri(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#hexInteger":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<byte[]> { Value = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;          Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dayTimeDuration":Di2015NewLine            case "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#yearMonthDuration":Di2015NewLine                _attributeValue = new AttributeValue<TimeSpan> { Value = XmlConvert.ToTimeSpan(value) };Di2015NewLine                break;                Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotImplementedException("Data type '" + xacmlDataType + "' is not a supported type.");Di2015NewLine        }           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _attributeValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
